title: Gae Bolg
description: #Fate Cu Chulainn - A cursed demonic spear crafted from the skull of a great beast owned by the legendary hero Cu Chulainn, the wounds inflicted with this spear are cursed to never heal. This effect can only be bypassed with Legendary rank healing. With Master rank Polearm mastery and practice you can access the noble phantasms of this weapon.

title: Excalibur the Sword of Promised Victory
description: #Fate Artoria - The Sword of Promised Victory that was crafted by the fae as the ultimate hope of humanity, one of the strongest weapons bound by 12 restraints unable to show its true power.

title: Laevatein
description: #Fate Surtr - The Sun-Like Sword that Becomes a Calamity owned by Surtr capable of wiping out all life on the planet as it incinerates all things, prioritizing life above all else, even a god would be reduced to ashes.

title: Deep Sea Knight Anchor
description: #Black Souls - The Anchor wielded by the Knight of the Deep Seas blessed by the blessing of the Secret Princess. Wielding this anchor doubles your strength and boosts the power of all water-based abilities.

title: Vorpal Blade
description: #Blacksouls - The sword of the Evil Dragon Slaying Rabbit, when wielded against a Dragon it gives the user enhanced physical stats and ignores a portion of the dragon's durability.

title: Demon Catalyst
description: #BlackSouls A staff carved from the bones and soul of a great demon, amplifies the power of all spells cast with it by 2x but also increases their mana consumption by 2x

title: Astral Injection
description: #Calamity Mod - An injection made from the essence of the starborn astral blight, MASSIVELY increases energy regeneration for 10 minutes but while the effect is active your insides will start tearing up and rotting from the influx of astral energy. Restock time: 120 hours

title: Yharim Stimulants
description: #Calamity Mod - An injection made by Dreadon to give its user immense might for a short time, upon injecting these stimulants you will receive a large boost in physical ability and a large boost in regenerative capabilities for 30 minutes. After duration passes you will be inflicted with weakness and exhaustion. Restock time: 120 Hours

title: Cloak of Invisibility
description: #A cloak that bends light around it to obscure its wearer

title: Master Key
description: #Allows you to open any physical lock and even barriers and wards by inserting the key and twisting it.

title: Spear of Longinus X
description: #Evangelion - A large red spear that adjusts size according to its user and changes its shape according to their needs, this spear can tear through even the strongest of barriers.

title: Invisible Air
description: #Fate Artoria - Barrier of the wind king is a barrier made of several layers of extremely compressed air that the user can control at will

title: Gae Buidhe
description: #Fate Diarmuid - A legendary spear carried by the hero Diarmuid. This spear is cursed to make its opponents never close whether it is by traditional healing or through magic, wounds inflicted by this spear cannot be healed by any healing below Legendary Level. The curse is also dispelled when the owner dies or the spear is broken. The spear can mend itself back together after being broken as it is a phantasmal object.

title: Gae Dearg
description: #Fate Diarmuid - A legendary spear carried by the hero Diarmuid. This spear is capable of severing and nullifying magic, making all forms of magical protection almost useless against it. This effect is not useful for dispelling spells but for bypassing them.

title: Gram
description: #DxD - The Strongest Demonic Sword on par with even Durandal. This sword is nigh unbreakable and the user is able to emit a destructive aura by expending their own energy, in addition, this sword is incredibly

title: Durandal
description: #DxD - One of the strongest Holy Swords. The legendary Durandal is said to be unbreakable and capable of severing anything, in addition, the Durandal can release a destructive aura in accordance to its user's wishes by expending their energy. This sword is extremely difficult to use for an inexperienced user.

title: Sword Birth
description: #DxD - A sacred gear created by god. It allows the user to conjure constructs of demonic swords with varying properties depending on the user's capabilities and skill. Swords that absorb flame or ones that are exceptionally sharp are just a few of the many examples. The user cannot create a sword that does something they themselves cannot do.

title: A skeleton
description: #An ordinary human skeleton from a completely ordinary person

title: Auric Tesla Armor
description: #(Tech)Calamity Mod - A power armor modeled after the one worn by the God Slaying Tyrant Yharim, wearing this armor grants an extreme boost to physical abilities, rare rank regeneration, hovering, and an extremely fast dash that can be activated every 10 seconds. This armor is managed by a virtual intelligence that controls its systems

title: Enuma Elish
description: #Fate Gilgamesh - The Sword of Rupture, Ea. Granted by the gods to King Gilgamesh, this sword was forged before the concept of swords was created. The sword is capable of releasing red winds capable of dislocating and shredding spacetime without expending the user's energy, in addition, it can act as a mortar when its full power is unleashed, allowing the user to unleash a beam that removes the texture of the world, essentially annihilating everything in its path.

title: Pokeball Set
description: #Pokemon - A set of Pokeballs that can capture creatures and house them for convenient storage, creatures caught by Pokeballs are registered as familiars by the system. Restock timer: 24 hours

title: Inverted Spear of Heaven
description: #JJK - The inverted spear of heaven is capable of dispelling any active ability effect it comes into contact with such as a fireball or a barrier, but does not work on basic energy applications and magic.

title: Cornucopia
description: #A horn that contains an unlimited amount of delicious and fresh ingredients that can be taken out at any time.

title: Tome of the Erdtree
description: #Elden Ring - Allows you to learn the incantations of the Erdtree such as healing and blessings. https://eldenring.wiki.fextralife.com/Erdtree+Incantations

title: Tome of the Grand Rizzard
description: #A tome containing vast knowledge in erotic magical arts allowing you to learn Eromancy.

title: Tricksters Book of Illusions
description: #A tome containing a variety of spells about illusions and tricks allowing you to learn DnD illusion spells from it. https://dnd5e.wikidot.com/spells:illusion

title: Dragon Ball
description: #Dragon Ball - A singular Dragon ball, if you gather all 7 you can summon Shenron to grant you a wish that is within his power or give yourself any ability below a 6.9 rating.

title: Stone Mask
description: #JoJo - A stone mask crafted by the Pillar Men that transforms any who wears it and drips blood on it to become a vampire.

title: Stone of Aja
description: #JoJo - A legendary jewel that has the ability to amplify hamon and light to extreme levels, wearing this pendant makes light abilities stronger, and using it with the stone mask one can turn themselves into a perfect lifeform.

title: Grimoire of the Twice Dead Death Mage
description: #Death Mage - A grimoire belonging to a magician of death who has died twice. Allows you to learn death attribute magic belonging to Vandalieu https://death-mage.fandom.com/wiki/Death-attribute_magic

title: Grimoire of the White Mage
description: #A tome containing a variety of spells about White Magic allowing the reader to learn White Magic spells such as healing, curing, buffs, and warding from it.

title: Grimoire of the Pyromancer
description: #A tome containing a variety of spells about fire and flame allowing the reader to learn Fire Magic from it.

title: Grimoire of the Cryomancer
description: #A tome containing a variety of spells about ice and cold allowing the reader to learn Ice Magic from it.

title: Grimoire of the Aeromancer
description: #A tome containing a variety of spells about Wind and Lightning allowing the reader to learn Air Magic from it.

title: Alchemilia
description: #A tome containing guides on how to make a lot of minor yet useful potions such as healing, energy recovery, etc. from mundane or ordinary ingredients. Those who haven't read Alchemilia physically cannot craft the potions it gives knowledge about.

title: Midas' Bag of Holding
description: #A small pouch the size of a human hand that contains a 1km x 1km square of space inside of it, whoever puts their hand inside can pull out what they are looking for no problem, the weight of the pouch does not change.

title: Bar of Vibranium
description: #Marvel - A bar of pure and refined Wakandan Vibranium ready to be processed, Vibranium has the special property of being able to absorb kinetic energy and vibrations, making it nigh unbreakable by conventional means

title: Angel Ring
description: #Modded Minecraft - An ornate gold ring that allows the user to freely move through the air at the same speed they can run at.

title: Black Barrel
description: #Fate - A gun that imposes the concept of limited life on any entity it hits, even absolute immortals will be rendered mortal by this weapon.

title: Black Key Rites
description: #Fate - A holy rite that allows the user to create black keys themselves using energy

title: Shroud of Martin
description: #Fate - A holy shroud once worn by a saint, when wrapped around an object, the shroud suppresses the object's state, making it stay "normal".

title: Enkidu
description: #Fate - The Chains of Heaven that can suppress the very gods, the chains can be manifested at any time and be controlled with your mind, the more holy or divine a target is, the stronger Enkidu is.

title: A pair of very comfortable socks
description: #Very comfortable, if you managed to roll this out of every treasure of the multiverse inside of the gacha you deserve pity.

title: Character Card Destinys Child
description: #Legendary Mechanic - Predict an 'opportunity' in the future. Can indicate a mission, an item, an action of a certain person… etc. The vision is accurate and detailed. This item has 5 uses and after 5 uses it will fade away.

title: HF Murasama
description: #(Tech)Metal Gear Rising Revengence - A crimson mechanical blade that vibrates at unreal frequencies, making it capable of slicing through almost anything.

title: Playful Cloud
description: #JJK - A cursed three-sectioned staff that amplifies in destructive power the higher the strength of its user.

title: Pokedex
description: #(Tech)Pokemon - A smart handheld device that can scan, identify, categorize, and analyze any race or species of creature in less than 10 seconds.

title: The Infinite Magazine
description: #A magazine that can morph into the magazine of any projectile shooting weapon and will supply it with infinite amounts of the ammo it uses as long as it stays attached.

title: Ticket to Belethor's General Goods
description: #Skyrim - Once you use this item, you are teleported to Belethors General Goods in Tamriel, Skyrim for 1 hour. You cannot leave a 10-meter circle from where you first appeared, allowing you to buy goods native to the world of Skyrim and Tamriel such as Soul Gems, Magic Books, etc. Cooldown: 720 hours

title: Hito Hito no Mi
description: #One Piece - A devil fruit that is capable of making an object or an animal capable of taking on a human or a hybrid form on the downside of making them unable to swim.

title: Triactis True Paladinian Mage-Hammer of Might
description: #Calamity Mod - A hammer once wielded by the greatest Paladin. Using this hammer amplifies the user's magical and physical abilities considerably as well as augmenting all spells that use the hammer as a focus. This hammer possesses tremendous might capable of flattening mountains, and when thrown, this hammer will find its way back to its user like the Mjolnir.

title: Ticket to the ITOPOD
description: #When used it sends you to the ITOPOD otherwise known as the Infinite Tower of Pissed Off Dudes. Every floor contains an enemy with an ability as strong as the corresponding floor. According to the floor you manage to finish your climb at, you will get an item of equal level.

title: Tome of Hands
description: #Love Advice From the Great Duke of hell - While holding this tome you are capable of transforming and creating hands out of any surface that you can control like your own limbs, with practice and study you can learn to do it without relying on the tome.

title: Furniture Catalog
description: #Allows you to instantly buy and get delivered any mundane furniture in your current world to your location via teleportation, all pieces of furniture cost their manufacturing cost. Cannot be accessed while in combat or in hostile territory.

title: Abyssal Diving Suit
description: #(Tech)Calamity Mod - An extremely tough power armor suit designed for deep sea exploration, and deep sea as in 3,000km under the sea deep, this suit is capable of easily adapting to any underwater condition whether its poison, corrosion, sea pressure, this suit will perform perfectly, allowing you to move and live in any underwater condition with ease.

title: Grand Gelatin
description: #Calamity Mod - A rainbow-colored gel in an ornate glass bottle, if you consume the grand gelatin you gain Advanced Poison Resistance, as well as a sizeable boost to your vitality and agility.

title: Ring of Swiftness
description: #A magical silver ornate ring that improves your agility, reflexes, and balance.

title: Sand Cloak
description: #A dusty brown cloak that helps hide your presence, and once every 8 hours you can cover yourself in a violent localized sandstorm to retreat or hide yourself.

title: Ambrosial Ampule
description: #Calamity Mod - Ambrosia of the gods, upon drinking it massively increases the drinker's vitality to the point it almost seems like they have regeneration, in addition, the drinker is cured of all illnesses and ailments.

title: Bloom Stone
description: #Calamity Mod - An ancient relic made out of a special green gem fitted into a necklace, under sunlight it gives its user regeneration depending on the time of day, at morning its Uncommon Regeneration, at Noon it is Rare Regeneration, afternoon Uncommon and at evening its Common, it gives no benefits at night.

title: Butchers Bag of Infinite Meat
description: #A bag containing a limitless amount of fresh meat inside of itself, you can only take 100kg of meat out of it every 24 hours, it contains meat from all mundane animals from earth in all cuts, all of it clean, not ethically sourced. Just plunge your hand into the bag of meat think of what you want and ignore the implication of infinite meat and its source.

title: Living Dew
description: #Calamity Mod - A living dew from the deepest depths of the ancient jungle was said to be capable of granting its owner longevity and vitality, and they were right. When you consume the living dew your vitality and lifespan are significantly increased, making you very resistant to all ailments and heal faster, in addition, these effects are amplified when you are in a jungle or forest.

title: Permafrosts Concoction
description: #Calamity Mod - The culmination of the Archamge Permafrost's work. Upon drinking this elixir, your energy/mana reserves and regeneration are greatly increased and all of your frost-related abilities gain massive buffs in addition to taking less energy/mana to cast. You are also greatly resistant to both cold and flame.

title: THE Stop Sign
description: #An indestructible stop sign, whenever the head of this stop sign makes contact with something it kills all of its momentum instantly.

title: Trinket of Chi
description: #Calamity Mod - A trinket held a devout monk who stood still until they became a statue. When standing still for more than 3 seconds you recover your energy/mana and health faster.

title: Evasion Scarf
description: #Calamity Mod - A scarf held by an evasive rogue swift as a shadow. When worn you can activate the effect of the scarf to gain a large speed boost and become intangible as you move in a straight line for 1 second, allowing you to move through your enemy's attack or slip through a wall when you need to dodge. 30 second cooldown.

title: Grimoire of Hemomancy
description: #Black Clover - A book containing the secrets of Blood Magic from the Clover Kingdom, allowing its users to learn and utilize Hemomancy. Spell List: https://blackclover.fandom.com/wiki/Blood_Magic

title: Grimoire of Pyromancy
description: #Black Cover - A book containing the secrets of Fire Magic from the Clover Kingdom, allowing its users to learn and utilize Pyromancy. Spell List: https://blackclover.fandom.com/wiki/Fire_Magic

title: Tome of Vector Magic
description: #Soul Eater - A tome belonging to one Medusa Gorgon, this book allows its user to learn and utilize her signature Vector Magic. Spell List: https://souleater.fandom.com/wiki/Vector_Magic

title: Boar Vessel 600-500 BC Etruscan ceramic
description: #It is a Boar Vessel 600-500 BC Etruscan ceramic, no further explanation needed.

title: Shitty Copper
description: #A bag of infinite shitty copper sourced from EA Nasir. Only contains 1000 tons of copper at a time and replenishes every 24 hours.

title: Belt of Giant Strength
description: #DnD - A large and crude brown belt that raises your physical strength to the level of a giant! (Which in effect acts like a Rare rank strength) But this only works if you are weaker than the strength of a giant

title: Blackrazor
description: #DnD - A legendary sentient greatsword sword capable of devouring souls, the souls Blackrazor devours are added to you as health and invigoration that fades over the span of 24 hours or can be stored inside of the blade. In addition, when wielding Blackrazor you can sense all souls in a 100-meter radius. But not letting the sword devour souls for a long span of time may make it grow restless.

title: Verminshroud
description: #DnD - A filthy patchwork cloak made of the hide of vermin such as rats and mice, no amount of cleaning will make this thing even remotely clean. While wearing this cloak you are able to transform yourself into a mundane vermin at will, in addition, you can control any vermin you can sense and gain Elite rank resistance to illness and poison while wearing it.

title: Topaz Annihilator
description: #DnD - This magic ranged weapon resembles a musket, but in lieu of any ammunition, it holds a glowing yellow scale from a topaz dragon in its heart, just like the founding fathers intended. Shots released from this gun are capable of rotting living creatures and disintegrating physical objects alongside the physical impact.

title: Hypnos' Mask
description: #A sleeping mask blessed by Hypnos, the god of sleep, when wearing this mask, your nights are perfectly restful and all of your energy recovers after 8 hours of uninterrupted sleep.

title: Blade Smith
description: #DxD - A Sacred Gear created by God that allows its user to create constructs of holy blades at will. The user can create holy swords that possess different attributes depending on the user's ability and skill. Examples like a sword that absorbs flames or a sword that poisons.

title: Dimension Lost
description: #DxD - A Longinus Created by God, capable of destroying the world with a good enough user - Dimension Lost is capable of creating a mist that can act as inviolable barriers or portals that transport targets to pocket dimensions it creates, allowing the user to teleport themselves and others freely as well as create their own pocket dimensions.

title: Sepiroth Graal
description: #DxD - A Longinus Created by God, once someone gets in possession of the Sepiroth Graal, they are granted knowledge of Soul, Death, and Life of the highest order on the level of a god, allowing its user to manipulate souls and life as long as they can withstand the mind-crushing levels of information that come from possessing it.

title: Alchemists Cauldron
description: #A large cauldron that can fill itself with a chosen potion once a day. As a basic cauldron, it is capable of filling itself with basic potions: Enhanced Strength, Enhanced Agility, Waterbreathing, Healing, Minor Regeneration, Stone Skin, etc.

title: Dragon Vessel Intermediate
description: #A large cauldron that can fill itself with a chosen potion once a day. As an intermediate cauldron, it is capable of filling itself with more advanced potions: Strength, Agility, Waterbreathing, Healing, Regeneration, Iron Skin, energy recovery, fertility, vitality, etc.

title: Dragon Vessel Major
description: #A large cauldron that can fill itself with a chosen potion once a day. As a major cauldron, it is capable of filling itself with major potions: Enhanced Strength, Enhanced Agility, Waterbreathing, greater Healing, greater Regeneration, Iron Skin, dragon breath, etc. as long as the user knows what the potion is and it is below Legendary rank it can be brewed.

title: Absorption Line
description: #DxD - A sacred gear created by god, allows the user to conjure energy lines that they can attach to targets to siphon their energy and restore their own. The lines can also be used to bind opponents or swing around like Spiderman.

title: Dreadons Gaming Chair
description: #(Tech)Calamity Mod - An incredibly powerful floating chair that is a marvel of technology, it has more calculation power than even the strongest supercomputers, can fly at supersonic speeds, and has powerful forcefields to guard whoever is sitting on it, the ultimate gaming chair.

title: Returner's Clock
description: #An ornate antique hand clock, this clock has 3 charges that cannot be refilled. You can use this watch to return to the morning of the current day by spending a charge. Once all 3 charges are spent, this clock will turn into dust.

title: Havels Greatshield
description: #Dark Souls - A shield of magical stone wielded by Havel the Rock. Wielding this shield grants enhanced durability and the user can expend energy to cover their body in stone to further reinforce their body.

title: Sanctus - Dark souls
description: #Dark Souls - A legendary weapon of the Way of White, granted to an Undead paladin long ago. Once blessed with the protection of a white flame, but its power has all but faded, so now all that remains of it is providing its wielder slight regeneration.

title: Ring of Favor and Protection
description: #Dark Souls - A ring symbolizing the favor and protection of the goddess Fina, known in legend to possess "fateful beauty". This ring boosts its wearer's Health, Stamina, and Endurane, but breaks if ever removed.

title: Covetous Gold Serpent Ring
description: #Dark Souls - The serpent is an imperfect dragon and a symbol of the Undead. Its habit of devouring prey even larger than itself has led to an association with gluttony. This gold ring, engraved with the serpent, boosts its wearer's luck so that more items can be amassed.

title: Ring of the Sun Princess
description: #Dark Souls - Ring associated with Gwynevere, princess of sunlight and eldest daughter of Gwyn, the First Lord. The ring is vaguely warm, like a beam of sunlight, and grants the user regeneration and restoration, this effect is further amplified by sunlight.

title: Slumbering Dragoncrest Ring
description: #Dark Souls -  his ring was secretly worn by a certain surreptitious sorcerer at Vinheim Dragon School. The ring is engraved with an everlasting dragon in silent slumber, and masks all sound emitting from its wearer.

title: Cloranthy Ring
description: #Dark Souls - This ancient ring, engraved with a large green flower, is of unknown origin. Hastens the regeneration of stamina and recovery from exhaustion.

title: Ring of fire resistance
description: #Dark Souls - Stoneplates, the symbol of a true knight, grant the strength to face various hardships. The red stoneplate symbolizes fire and boosts defense against flame and heat.

title: Blue Stoneplate Ring
description: #Dark Souls - Stoneplates, the symbol of a true knight, grant the strength to face various hardships. The cyan stoneplate symbolizes ice and boosts defense against ice and cold.

title: Yellow Stoneplate Ring
description: #Dark Souls - Stoneplates, the symbol of a true knight, grant the strength to face various hardships. The yellow stoneplate symbolizes lightning and storms and boosts defense against lightning and wind.

title: Speckled Stoneplate Ring
description: #Dark Souls - Stoneplates, the symbol of a true knight, grant the strength to face various hardships. The precious rare speckled stoneplate grants a small boost to defense against all elemental effects.

title: Ring of Steel Protection
description: #Dark Souls - This ring belonged to the Knight King Rendal. It grants its wearer protection by boosting defense against physical attacks.

title: Energy Drink
description: #A can of drink that contains 330ml of green juice inside, drinking all of the liquid recovers your energy/mana by 30%, drinking more than 3 cans a day will instantly cause a stroke and a heart attack. Restock Timer: 24 Hours

title: Cloak of Bellowing
description: #DnD - A fancy embroidered red cloak that can bellow majestically even in the absence of wind.

title: Wardrobe of Mending
description: #A wardrobe of fancy clothes that suit your tastes, when not worn for more than 24 hours these clothes instantly mend themselves into mind condition.

title: Sakuya Fumo
description: #A Fumo of one of the greatest maids, it is said that whatever house this plushie is placed in is maintained as if 10 maids are cleaning and organizing it 24/7.

title: Dread Helm
description: #DnD - A black metal helmet that is fairly durable, the eye holes in the visor can also glow an intimidating red.

title: Cleaning Stone
description: #DnD - A small blue bead that slowly cleans and removes filth from everything within a 10-meter radius of it.

title: All-purpose tool
description: #DnD - A screwdriver that shapes itself into any mundane tool such as hammers, knives, chisels, etc.

title: Amulet of Health
description: #A gold amulet with a red gem that slightly increases the vitality of its wearer.

title: Magical Beans
description: #A pouch containing a bunch of magical bean seeds that when planted grow over the course of 24 hours to create a steam that is 50 meters thick and extends into space.

title: Special Tattoo Kit
description: #A tattoo kit that allows the user to create and inscribe special magical tattoos onto people and imbue them with a variety of effects according to their abilities.

title: The Collar of Obedience
description: #A collar that when placed around someone's neck, compels them to obey the owner of the collar, cannot be placed around the neck of someone capable of resisting.

title: Unbreakable Shield
description: #A shield that is completely unbreakable, it is the shape of a heater shield slightly larger than one torso, this shield still transfers energy as the energy transferred to the shield still has to go somewhere but hey, the shield still unbroken.

title: Mystery of the Night Sky
description: #Blacksouls - A pair of panties belonging to the Outer One beyond the stars who exist everywhere at once, when in your possession these panties help recover your energy and health faster as well as decrease the cooldown of abilities by 33%.

title: Can of Febreeze
description: #A can of Febreze that can spray infinitely. From Walmart.

title: Meeseeks Box
description: #Rick and Morty - A box with a button that when pressed summons a very competent humanoid called Mr. Meeseeks that will obey your order to the best of their capabilities and disappear afterward. Warning, giving Meeseeks a mission they cannot complete or will take more than 7 days to complete will cause them to get hostile and violent.

title: The Monster Girl Encyclopedia
description: #A book about monster girls, but its real use is to turn any monster it touches into female versions that the user would find attractive, the strength and abilities of the target are not altered in any way and the target views this change as natural and will not question it.

title: Magic Scroll Blizzard
description: #A magical scroll that when invoked calls on a fierce 1km wide blizzard centered on the user that does not affect them that lasts for 30 minutes. Restock Timer: 8 hours

title: Exorcists Gloves
description: #A pair of magical white gloves that allows you to interact with spiritual beings like they are solid.

title: Tome of Rennala
description: #Elden Ring - A tome containing the research and magic of the Carian Royal family, allowing those who study it to learn and wield the Carian Sorceries. Spell List: https://eldenring.wiki.fextralife.com/Carian+Sorceries

title: Tome of Deathblight
description: #Elden Ring - A tome contains the research and records of Those Who Live in Death that worship Godwyn, the Prince of Death, allowing those who study it to learn and wield the Death Sorceries. Spell List: https://eldenring.wiki.fextralife.com/Death+Sorceries

title: Perfect Decoy
description: #An exact replica of your body down to the most minute detail but damaging it reveals that even though it looks like you, it has no DNA or genetics, more like a flesh puppet made to look like you.

title: Tome of Raya Lucaria
description: #Elden Ring - A magical tome containing the teachings of the Raya Lucaria Academy, allowing its reader to learn and harness Glintstone magic. Spell List: https://eldenring.wiki.fextralife.com/Glintstone+Sorceries

title: Tome of the Starscourge
description: #Elden Ring - A magical tome containing the studies and records of Radahn the Starscourge, allowing its reader to study it to learn and harness his gravity magic. Spell List: https://eldenring.wiki.fextralife.com/Gravity+Sorceries

title: Cruise Ship
description: #(Tech)A large luxury cruise ship that is 350 meters long and 80 meters wide, the cruise ship is manned by automatons that cannot perform any duty other than the ones they are assigned to in the ship. In addition, this ship has infinite fuel in its engine.

title: Tank
description: #(Tech)A large indistinct military tank with infinite fuel and tank shells inside of it. Fuel and shells cannot be taken out of the vehicle.

title: Pocket Armory
description: #A large grey duffel bag containing a copy of every cold weapon made from high-quality steel, you can take any one weapon out at a time from this bag, if you put the weapon back, the next time you take it out, it will be back in perfect condition.

title: Servant Voucher
description: #A coupon that allows you to summon your own Heroic Spirit for free, the summoned heroic spirit depends on you as a person. The servant is bound to you in standard Grail War style, with them receiving mana through you via coitus and you possessing 3 command seals to give absolute commands to them. Cannot summon Divine Servants(Divinity above C or Explicitly a god) or Servants that qualify for a Grand position.

title: Stimpack
description: #(Tech)Fallout - A potent medical tool from a post-apocalypse world. A stim pack is a syringe pack filled with modified stem cells and healing agents that boost the human body's natural regenerative properties into overdrive. WARNING: Usage of the stimpack without enough nutrients or minerals in the body can cause more harm than good. Restock Timer: 24 hours

title: Staff of the Pheonix
description: #An ornate staff carved out of pure ruby with gold engravings, using this staff as a focus for using fire abilities and spells increases their power and reduces their cost.

title: Moonlight Greatsword
description: #Dark Souls - A sword mage of moonlight crafted from the severed tail of Seath the Scaleless. Wielding this sword makes your spells stronger and you can unleash blasts of magical power from its blade.

title: Super Crown - Mario
description: #A magical crown that turns whoever wears it into a pretty girl.

title: Crate of Explosives
description: #A crate full of 64 sticks of dynamite that restocks itself every 24 hours.

title: Gold Apple
description: #Minecraft - A magical apple with skin resembling gold, eating it gives the eater uncommon level regeneration for one hour. Restock Timer: 120 Hours

title: Enchanted Golden Apple
description: #Minecraft - A magical apple with skin resembling gold that has been enchanted with magic, eating it gives the eater rare level regeneration for one hour and also bolsters their vitality. Restock Timer: 210 Hours

title: Grimoire of Wind Magic
description: #Black Cover - A book containing the secrets of Wind Magic from the Clover Kingdom, allowing its users to learn and utilize Aeromancy. Spell List: https://blackclover.fandom.com/wiki/Wind_Magic

title: Lightsaber
description: #Star Wars - A classic textbook lightsaber made from a Kyber Crystal that projects a blade of energy, no, you do not need force powers to use this one.

title: Wand of the Ice Fairy
description: #A wand made of blue ice crystals that is somehow not cold to the touch but pleasantly cool instead, using this wand as a focus for cold and ice abilities and spells increases their potency and reduces their cost.

title: Divine Shotgun
description: #"Faith in the form of bullets." An unremarkable-looking two-barrel shotgun that consumes your energy/mana and condenses holy light bullets with each trigger. These bullets are lethal to all unholy beings and they are unable to heal from the wounds inflicted by the shotgun.

title: Druids Living Wand
description: #A wand crafted out of still living wood, focusing nature and healing abilities and spells from this wand increases their power and reduces their cost.

title: Movement Ring
description: #Very useful when you really need some mobility. This ring has 3 total charges and recovers a charge every hour. You can use a charge for three things, a 10-meter range blink, 10 seconds of flight, or 10 seconds of Haste.

title: Pitcher of Eternal water
description: #Hunter x Hunter - A water pitcher that can pour endless amounts of refreshing clean water when tipped.

title: Skin Care Hot Springs
description: #Grants you ownership of your own hot spring onsen, the onsen is fully functional and magically maintains itself without your input, when taken out of storage the onsen places itself in an appropriate position in your current city with proper paperwork and its own history in the world, people will not find the existence of the hot spring popping into existence strange.

title: Apartment in Between
description: #You are now the proud owner of an apartment floating in stasis between all of eternity and infinity, it is a modern one-bedroom apartment with working electricity, heating, wifi, and gas.

title: Liquor Spring
description: #Hunter x Hunter - An ornate spring fountain that flows with water perpetually, any water taken out of the spring turns into a high-quality alcoholic drink of the user's choice. The water will only transform if it has been taken out of the spring for an hour. Returning the transformed alcohol to the spring will return it back to its water state.

title: Mystery Pond
description: #Hunter x Hunter - A large mysterious pond. If you release one fish into it, the next day you will have another of that same type. This pond allows for all different kinds of fish to live within it together, regardless of whether they are freshwater or saltwater fish.

title: Golden Scales
description: #Hunter x Hunter - When faced with two different choices, these scales will tell the user which of the choices will be better for the future. These scales can be extremely useful in tough situations. One example could be whether to run or fight. Another could be whether you should take up a job offer or when you first meet someone.

title: Angels Breath
description: #Hunter x Hunter - A golden card that can someone all of all injuries and illnesses below Mythical rank. Can only be used once.

title: Poltergeists Pillow
description: #Hunter x Hunter - This card allows the user's spirit to explore the world at your own will, providing that you sleep on it first. This card can be useful for spying on other people or just plain exploring the world in a different way. Whilst in your astral form, you are able to pass through solid objects and you can't be seen by other creatures. You will turn into a real ghost though if you don't return to your body within 24 hours.

title: X-ray Goggles
description: #Hunter x Hunter - a pair of X-ray goggles that can be used to see through any wall or object. A dial is available to adjust the vision depth.

title: Book of VIP Passes
description: #Hunter x Hunter - A book which contains 1000 V.I.P Passes. You are able to use each pass to act as a 'Very Important Person'. As such, you are able to go anywhere and access any area for the price of a single pass. Each pass transforms to match the required specifications for an event. The pass is destroyed after use. The book is destroyed when no more V.I.P. passes are left.

title: Hormone Cookies
description: #Hunter x Hunter - These cookies when ingested, temporarily change the user's gender to the opposite sex. These effects last for 24 hours. The card gives you 10 boxes, with each box containing 20 cookies. Eating 20 in one day makes the change permanent.

title: Recycling Can
description: #A large metal can the size of a person, whatever item you put inside of it will be perfectly broken down to its basic physical materials.

title: Hideout Realtor
description: #Hunter x Hunter - Create a secret hideout in a location of your choosing, the hideout will be stocked with the essentials and the only way to access it will be through the door you have created.

title: Long Lost Delivery
description: #Hunter x Hunter - A cell phone with a single number inside of it, call the number and describe the item or object you have lost and it will be returned and delivered back to you in less than a week. Cooldown: 168 Hours

title: Witch's Rejuvenation Potion
description: #Hunter x Hunter - A bottle containing 100 pills that each make you physically one year younger when consumed. Restock Timer: 168 Hours

title: Doyens Growth Pills
description: #Hunter x Hunter - A vial of 100 pills that make you grow by 1cm each time you take a pill, it is not advised to be used by people under 20 years of age. Restock Timer: 168 Hours

title: Doyens Virility Pills
description: #Hunter x Hunter - A vial of 100 pills that give you endurance and fertility in bed, taking more than one at a time may have unintended effects. Restock Timer: 168 Hours

title: Doyens Hair Cream
description: #Hunter x Hunter - A tub of cream that permanently grows luxurious and quality hair wherever it is applied, it is advised to use gloves when handling. Restock Timer: 168 Hours

title: Mad Scientists Steroids
description: #Hunter x Hunter - A box of 7 1 liter vials of special medicine that makes your body more powerful when you ingest them, you have to ingest 1 liter of this every day throughout an entire week for them to take effect, afterwards, you gain the Uncommon Trait Enhanced Strength. Restock Timer: 168 Hours

title: Levitation Necklace
description: #A necklace that when worn, allows the user to slowly fly at 10 km/h.

title: Heros Bandages
description: #A set of sentient bandages that automatically wrap around your wounds and injuries, the bandages are really good at stopping bleeding and stabilizing broken bones. With training, you can manipulate the bandages yourself too.

title: Fairy Powder
description: #Blacksouls - A bag of fairy powder from the Lost Empire, inhaling causes people to fall into a deep sleep instantly but any injury will cause them to wake up instantly. Does not work on people over a tier stronger than you. Restock Timer: 48 Hours

title: Scrap Iron Candy
description: #Blacksouls -"Tastes like its name" When consumed, bolsters the user's defence for 30 minutes. Restock Timer: 8 Hours

title: Hlanith Wine
description: #Blacksouls - A wine favored by the ones beyond the stars, its taste is indescribable, and drinking it, while making the drinker tips, also grants mental clarity and insight. Restock Timer: 24 Hours

title: Star Fluid
description: #Blacksouls - A drug created by harvesting it from star pests from beyond the unfathomable cosmos, drinking this fluid causes one to become an immortal ghoul but lose all sanity and still continue decomposing. This more refined version only grants a brief immortality for 30 seconds, allowing the drinker to avoid death for the duration. But taking more than 2 in a week will result in one becoming a Ghould. Restock Timer: 480 Hours

title: Phantom Thief's Mantle
description: #Blacksouls - A crimson worn by a famous thief death-defying thief who tempted fate one too many times and got executed by the tyrant. Wearing this mantle grants you basic danger sense and enhanced reflexes.

title: Evil Eye Ring
description: #Blacksouls - "Did the eye just move?" A gold ring topped with a ruby in the shape of an eye, wearing this ring grants the user minor regeneration.

title: Hydrogen Bomb
description: #(Tech)A Hydrogen Bomb and a remote detonator for it, simple as. Try not to end up in the blast zone.

title: Cheshire Cats ring
description: #Blacksouls - A gold ring with the engraving of a cat that looks suspiciously smug. When wearing this ring, you are immune to falling damage even if you drop from 100,000 kilometers.

title: Wind Gods Ring
description: #Blacksouls - An ornate silver ring from Wonderland, blessed by an unnamed god of wind, wearing it boosts the agility and reflexes of the wearer to superhuman levels.

title: Thief's Ring
description: #A magical ring worn by a famous thief known for their whimsy and mischief. This can carry 3 charges at a time and recovers a charge every hour. You can use a charge to use the ability steal to steal an item on a person and bring it to your hands, the better the item the lesser the success rate. You can also spend a charge to muffle all noises you make for a minute or increase your dexterity and agility for a minute

title: Windless Wrap
description: #Blacksouls - A blue cloak that makes the user not disturb even the wind, while wearing this cloak you gain enhanced agility and reflexes, in addition, all sounds you make are muffled and you don't disturb the air around you as you move.

title: 0 - The Fool
description: #Tarot Card - Temporarily gives you a skill or minor ability that is best suited for the situation, said abilities rating cannot be higher than the Fool. 168-hour cooldown

title: I - The Magician
description: #Tarot Card - Increase the rarity of an ability temporarily for one hour. 240 hour cooldown

title: II - The High Priestess
description: #Tarot Card -  Temporarily speeds up perception, emulating a bullet time effect and gives Precognition for 30 minutes. 120 Hour Cooldown

title: III - The Empress
description: #Tarot Card - Creates an aura that increases defense and recovery centered on the user for 30 minutes. 120 Hour Cooldown

title: IV - The Emperor
description: #Tarot Card - Creates immense mental pressure that can dominate a target or crush their minds. 72 Hour Cooldown

title: V - The Hierophant
description: #Tarot Card - Allows you to dispel any illusions in your line of sight. 72 Hour Cooldown.

title: VI - The Lovers
description: #Tarot Card - Allows you to select an ability from anyone in a 100-meter range and copy their ability into your ability slot for 1 hour. 120 Hour Cooldown

title: VII - The Chariot
description: #Tarot Card - Allows you to teleport to any location within your range of perception or even through a camera. 120 Hour Cooldown

title: VIII - Strength
description: #Tarot Card - Increases all of your physical abilities and dulls your sense of pain for 30 minutes. 120 Hour Cooldown

title: IX - The Hermit
description: #Tarot Card - Allows you to read the minds and thoughts for 1 hour. 120 Hour Cooldown

title: X - Wheel of Fortune
description: #Tarot Card - Temporarily swaps all active powers with random powers of the same rarity for 1 hour, (For writing: done by rolling the gacha that corresponds with said rarity). 120 Hour Cooldown

title: XI - Justice
description: #Tarot Card - Clears all abnormal status effects such as disease, poison, curses and charms Epic rank and below in a 10-meter radius. Cooldown: 120 hours.

title: XII - The Hanged Man
description: #Tarot Card - Allows you to absorb all of the wounds and ailments of a target while lessening their intensity by 20%. 120 Hour Cooldown

title: XIII - Death
description: #Tarot Card - In contact, allows you to destroy any active effect, whether that is the speed of an object, a mythical ritual, or a spell keeping an undead animated. 240-hour Cooldown.

title: XIV - Temperance
description: #Tarot Card - Allows you to attain complete mental clarity and focus, dispelling all negative mental conditions. 48 Hour Cooldown.

title: XV - The Devil
description: #Tarot Card - Summons Infernal chains that restrain a target and weaken them, strong enough targets can break out the chains. 48 Hour Cooldown.

title: XVI - The Tower
description: #Tarot Card - Releases a wave of uncontrollable ruinous energy that can destroy entire city blocks partially ignores durability and disorientates enemies. 120 Hour Cooldown

title: XVII - The Star
description: #Tarot Card - Restores all energy and stamina upon use as well as resetting all Ability Cooldowns. 240 Hour Cooldown

title: XVIII - The Moon
description: #Tarot Card - Upon use construct a very convincing illusionary world of your choosing that fools all 5 senses for 1 hour. 120 Hour Cooldown

title: XIX - The Sun
description: #Tarot Card - Upon use recovers all of your health instantly and resets all Item Cooldowns. 240 Hour Cooldown

title: XX - Judgement
description: #Tarot Card - Allows you to compel someone to tell what they think is the truth without being able to intend to trick you. 120 Hour Cooldown

title: XXI - The World
description: #Tarot Card - Allows you to permanently fuse two abilities of the same rank to receive an ability of a higher rank. 240 Hour Cooldown

title: Volcano
description: #Terraria - A sword of flame forged with ore from the depths of hell itself, amplifies the power of Fire based abilities when using Volcano as a focus.

title: Starlight
description: #Terraria - A fancy rapier of light forged from the wing of the empress of light, deals light damage and amplifies the power of Light based abilities when using Starlight as a focus.

title: Ghastly Glaive
description: #Terraria - A glaive from a foreign world that can summon projections of wraiths using the wielder's life energy and amplifies the power of Soul-based abilities when using Ghastly Glaive as a focus.

title: North Pole
description: #Terraria - A crystalline spear forged from what remained of the shattered ice queen. Allows the wielder to produce blasts of frigid from their own energy by using the North Pole as a catalyst. Amplifies the power of Ice-based abilities when using the North Pole as a focus.

title: Daybreak
description: #Terraria - A spear of pure energy formed from the shards of a fallen star. Allows the user to summon copy projections of Daybreak to use as projectiles by hurling them like Javelins. Amplifies the power of Fire and light-based abilities when using Daybreak as a focus

title: Sunfury
description: #Terraria - A flail of flame retrieved from the depths of the underworld. Whenever this flail impacts something it will create an explosion on contact.

title: Blue Moon
description: #Terraria - A flail retrieved from the cursed dungeon. It is made out of incredibly durable material and the chain can stretch up to 50 meters long.

title: Ice Blade
description: #Terraria - A saber crafted from solid ice enchanted with magic so that it holds its sharpness. You can release frigid energy from this blade using your own energy and using this blade as a focus for ice abilities increases their potency.

title: Space Dolphin Machine Gun
description: #(Tech)Terraria - A dolphin from space that has been expertly crafted into a futuristic sci-fi machine gun that can shred through any mundane material but its speed will make it rather difficult to keep up with its ammo consumption.

title: Onyx Blaster
description: #Terraria - A shotgun crafted from shards of pure darkness. This gun does not consume bullets but instead converts energy/mana into shards of dark onyx bullets that deal unholy damage.

title: Death's Sickle
description: #Terraria - A sickle taken from the cold dead hands of the reaper. You can release necrotic energy projection from the blade using your own energy and using this scythe as a focus for Dark and Necrotic abilities increases their potency.

title: Inferno Fork
description: #Terraria - A crimson trident that is taken from the deepest depths of the cursed dungeon. You can release blasts of flame from this weapon by expending your own energy/mana. Using this trident as a focus for Fire and Unholy abilities increases their potency.

title: Last Prism
description: #Terraria - A prism that comes from the moon, By infusing energy/mana into the prism you can release rays of incinerating light that converge into one large laser or you can use it as a focus for light-based abilities to largely increase their potency.

title: Holy Water
description: #A large glass vial holding 500ml of high-quality holy water that can be used for rituals or for dealing with the pesky unholy. Restock Timer: 4 Hours

title: Golden Cross
description: #A golden cross blessed by a powerful angel, it wards off evil and curses when worn around the neck and burns demonic entities in the vicinity.

title: Super Absorbant Sponge
description: #Terraria - A sponge that can hold approximately 1,000,000,000 liters of water inside of it, don't ask how it doesn't change in size or weight regardless of how much is inside of it.

title: Heavy Blade
description: #A very durable longsword that you can control the weight of, going from 5kg at lightest to 50,000kg at heaviest.

title: Metal Gear Excelsus
description: #(Tech)Metal Gear - A gigantic multi-city block-sized arachnid mech with retractable blades and giant plasma canons coupled with uncanny amounts of mobility and dexterity. In addition, this mech was designed to be able to withstand advanced nuclear weaponry and its durability reflects it. It is constantly maintained and repaired by its fleet of nanomachines and even has living quarters.

title: The Straw Hat
description: #One Piece - Holds a lot of sentimental value to a certain sun god but not much material value.

title: Modified Compound V
description: #The Boys - Upon consuming this, the drinker will gain a random ability from the Gold Gacha that they can use even when in ability storage.

title: Sharingan
description: #Naruto - A pair of Sharingan plucked freshly from a Sasuke Uchiha who just unlocked them, stored in a special fluid that makes sure they don't degrade. If you find a skilled enough doctor you can have them implanted.

title: Byakugan
description: #Naruto - A pair of byakugan plucked freshly from a Neji Hyuga who just unlocked them, stored in a special fluid that makes sure they don't degrade. If you find a skilled enough doctor you can have them implanted.

title: Iron Man Armor Mark 3
description: #(Tech)Marvel - The iconic armored suit of the Iron Man, while useful is not particularly powerful, and if it breaks, good luck repairing it.

title: Infinity Gauntlet
description: #Marvel - You have the gauntlet, it's pretty damn durable, but the stones are not included.

title: Greed's Coin
description: #"Fancy your chances?" Choose a ticket in your inventory and flip a coin, if it lands on Heads, the ticket gets an advantage, if it lands on Tails, the ticket is destroyed.

title: Durable Baseball Bat
description: #An extremely durable baseball bat, it would take at least a nuclear bomb to deform it.

title: Combat Armor
description: #A basic set of Combat Armor perfectly tailored to you, you can upgrade this armor by putting 10 kilograms of whatever ore you want inside of it, after 24 hours the composition of the armor will change to that of the ore or metal you placed inside.

title: Kamui Senketsu
description: #Kill La Kill - A piece of sentient clothing made exclusively out of liber that synchronizes with its wearer to augment their physical abilities to extreme levels while draining their vitality in exchange. Senketsu is more durable than any manmade material, can act independently and shapeshift,

title: Goku Uniform 1star
description: #Kill La Kill - A school uniform made of 10% Life Fibers, granting their wearers superhuman physical abilities strong enough to break walls and flip cars. The uniforms themselves are also extremely durable, even more than carbon fiber. You can choose the colors before taking it out.

title: Goku Uniform 2star
description: #Kill La Kill - A uniform made of 20% Life Fibers, granting their wearers superhuman physical abilities strong enough to break punch through solid metal and throw around cars. The uniforms themselves are also extremely durable, even more than carbon fiber. You can choose the colors and design before taking it out.

title: Goku Uniform 3star
description: #Kill La Kill - A uniform made of 30% Life Fibers, granting their wearers superhuman physical abilities strong enough to demolish entire buildings. The uniforms themselves are also extremely durable, even more than carbon fiber. You can choose the colors and design before taking it out. By consuming your own vitality you can unlock a second form of the uniform that increases its abilities even further.

title: Your Laptop
description: #(Tech)Your laptop from back on earth, or whatever computer you had, still connected to the internet you had back on earth.

title: Infinite Bowl of Spaghetti
description: #A bowl containing an infinite amount of spaghetti, it cannot be poured out but you can take servings out infinitely, the spaghetti that comes out is always comfortably warm and tastes pretty good.

title: Kanaedas Bike
description: #(Tech)Akira - A very fancy and fast sci-fi-ish bike, very iconic.

title: Any Vehicle Voucher
description: #(Tech)You can exchange this voucher any time for any Mundane Vehicle available in your world, ranging from a supercar to a cruise ship, the vehicle will teleport in front of you with all of the legal work taken care of.

title: Refined Heart-Shaped Herb
description: #Marvel - A mystical herb from Wakanda blessed by the goddess Bast. This harvest has been refined to filter out any harmful side effects and mystical strings attached, making it completely safe to consume. Consuming it grants enhanced strength, speed, stamina, durability, reflexes, agility, and instincts. Restock Timer: 240 Hours

title: Senzu Bean
description: #Dragon Ball - A small bean containing mystical power cultivated personally by the guardian of the earth. Consuming it instantly restores physical condition to its peak, restores energy completely, and keeps a person satiated for 10 days. Restock Timer: 720 Hours

title: Unknown Mask
description: #A white featureless mask that covers the entire face, unless the user desires to remove it the mask cannot be removed except by breaking it, this mask cannot be seen through and is resistant toward thinker abilities. The user can see through the mask without a problem.

title: Monster Cell
description: #One Punch Man - A cell resembling a virus the size of the human hand. Upon consumption, it makes the consumer unbelievably stronger and transforms them into a monstrous creature with an extended lifespan in exchange for making them unable to develop any further through natural means.

title: Ability Ticket
description: #A ticket that acts as a 6x Advantage Platinum Ability Gacha Ticket

title: Trait Ticket
description: #A ticket that acts as a 6x Advantage Platinum Trait Gacha Ticket

title: Skill Ticket
description: #A ticket that acts as a 6x Advantage Platinum Skill Gacha Ticket

title: Uroboros Virus
description: #Resident Evil - The Uroboros virus is a powerful virus that is capable of transforming hosts. If you aren't an exact match for the Virus to consider you a host, you will be transformed into an anomalous mass of blackened matter with incredible regenerative capability, if you are a match however, it will instead overhaul your body, granting you enhanced stats and bio immortality as the virus will regenerate and heal your body as well as being able to command it from your body. Or you could pour the vial into the ocean and watch the apocalypse.

title: Tvirus
description: #Resident Evil - A super virus that is capable of mutating people into zombie-like creatures with enhanced physical ability but little brain activity, it is incredibly viral and easy to spread. There is a small chance of having appropriate resistance to the virus and only gaining positives from it like superhuman capabilities and regeneration without mutation and degradation but it is an incredibly rare chance of that level of compatibility. Maybe a scientist could refine it to make it more useful, you could pour the vial into the ocean and watch the apocalypse.

title: Modified Tvirus
description: #Resident Evil - A modified syringe of modified T-Virus that gives whoever is injected all of the benefits of the T-virus without any of the downsides, granting them superhuman physical abilities, regeneration, and telekinesis.

title: The Beherit
description: #Berserk - A red egg resembling a face that can call down God's Hand. In exchange for sacrificing your everything in the eclipse, you can become a member of the Godhand and become an Apostle. ...If you are even considering using this, something is truly wrong with you.

title: Chekov's Box
description: #A box that looks like a wrapped gift, when you open this box it will give you precisely what you need for the situation as long as it is ranked below Elite

title: Cloak of Levitation
description: #Marvel - A relic belonging to the sorcerer supreme. This cloak allows its user to fly freely, but not only that but it is also self-aware and can act on its own to pull its wearer out of danger and hinder their opponents.

title: plague Canister
description: #(Tech)Calamity Mod - A canister containing the plague, a self-replicating nanomachine virus that devours biomass and turns any living thing into a mindless biomechanically enhanced zombie to add to its own hivemind. Releasing this thing without sufficient biokinetic or techno mastery is basically dooming the entire world, thankfully without a core they lack a hivemind to gather around as a command center.

title: Mehrunes Razor
description: #Skyrim - A blade belonging to the Daedric prince Mehrunes Dagon, this dagger is capable of cutting anything the user can interact with, space, time, soul, connections, etc. The only limit to what it can cut is the user, not the dagger.

title: Skeleton Key
description: #Skyrim - A magical key belonging to the Daedric prince Nocturnal, it is capable of unlocking anything the user can perceive. Ranging from locks to unlocking the structural integrity of a wall to make it collapse to unlocking someone's inner potential and even opening portals to other worlds. The only limit to what it can unlock is the user, not the key.

title: Cloak of Invisibility
description: #Harry Potter - One of the deathly hallows, this cloak is capable of rendering anyone covered by it invisible and resistant to clairvoyance.

title: Annihilation Maker
description: #DxD - One of the strongest Longinus crafted by god. Annihilation Maker is capable of creating shadow monsters that emerge from the user's shadow by expending their own mana. The abilities of the monsters depend on the user's imagination and abilities.  When taken out of the inventory, it resembles a small marble that fuses with the person who swallows it.

title: Unknown Dictator
description: #DxD - Unknown Dictator, one of the modern Longinus. It is capable of manipulating metal and technology on a massive scale as well as being able to construct advanced technology like ion canons and aura engines at will without detailed input from the user. The stronger the user the stronger the creations made by Unknown Dictator are.  When taken out of the inventory, it resembles a small marble that fuses with the person who swallows it.

title: Zenith Tempest
description: #DxD - Zenith Tempest, referred to as one of the mightiest Longinus is capable of controlling the weather, atmosphere, and the natural elements of the world like fire, wind, lightning, and water. Allowing them to call down lightning, country-wiping storms, and much more. A powerful enough user could shred the surface of the planet with violent storms. When taken out of the inventory, it resembles a small marble that fuses with the person who swallows it.

title: Star Buster Blaster
description: #DxD - A Longinus of the highest order and a weapon when you just need simplicity. Even in its basic form, the sword of this weapon can cut through gods and its gun can annihilate islands. But the weapon is incredibly difficult to control and use effectively, and may even destroy the landmass the user is in in a misfire.  When taken out of the inventory, it resembles a small marble that fuses with the person who swallows it.

title: Canis Lycaon
description: #DxD - Canis Lycaon, one of the Longinus weapons created by god. It allows its user to manifest an extremely powerful black wolf avatar wielding a cursed blade, in addition, the user can sprout cursed blades from their body and use them as weapons too. With enough training, they can wield the cursed flames of the sword that prevent healing and sprout blades from any shadow in their range of perception. When taken out of the inventory, it resembles a small marble that fuses with the person who swallows it.

title: True Longinus
description: #DxD - The greatest holy spear that contains a piece of god inside of itself. This holy spear, in addition to having a tremendous holy aura that can utterly annihilate any demonic being weaker than a god, possesses a variety of forms that the user can access with training.

title: Telos Karma
description: #DxD - The Telos Karma, the treasure of god that allows its user to twist causality and fate, altering history to affirm the effect the user wants. The larger the scale of the effect and the stronger the targets it affects the more energy Telos Karma consumes. When taken out of the inventory, it resembles a small marble that fuses with the person who swallows it.

title: Regulus Nemea
description: #DxD - Battle Axe of the Nemean, one of the Longinus crafted by god himself. As its base form, it is a large golden powerful battle axe that protects its user from projectiles when they wield it, it can also turn into a projection of the original Nemean Lion with its invincible skin that can act independently. With training the user can even unlock its balance breaker forms. When taken out of the inventory, it resembles a small marble that fuses with the person who swallows it.

title: Nereied Kyre
description: #DxD - One of the newly manifested Longinus, its user is capable of controlling the ocean and charming dragons with their singing, their ability to charm and control dragons is limited by their singing and magical power. A powerful enough user could use it to sink continents and tame the grandest of dragons. When taken out of the inventory, it resembles a small marble that fuses with the person who swallows it.

title: Procellarum Phantom
description: #DxD - An armor that manifests primarily as leg armor that enhances its user's kicks and speed.

title: Nights Edge
description: #Terraria - A sword of night formed from the essences of the world. In addition to its exceptional durability and sharpness this blade also enhances the potency of all darkness abilities when used as a focus. Under certain conditions, this sword can unlock its true power comparable to the Excalibur itself.

title: Moonveil
description: #Elden Ring - A masterpiece sword forged from glintstone. This katana is able to project the user's slashes as blue blades of light, in addition, this sword amplifies the power of spells when used as a focus.

title: Malikeths Black Blade
description: #Elden Ring - A sword that still carries traces of the destined death inside of its blade, by expending your own energy/mana you can unleash black flames of destined death that permanently harm the lifeforce of any it harms, making them unable to be healed by anything lesser than divine intervention.

title: Beginners Guide to Runecraft
description: #Fate - A beginner's guide on basic Nordic/Scandinavian runecraft written personally by the Allfather Odin himself. Allowing those who study it to learn the art of Runecraft.

title: Grow Your Own Golem Kit
description: #A beginner-friendly kit for growing your very own golem that even a child can use. Contains a comically large pot the size of a person, a watering can, a pack of cores, and a notebook. Simply put the core in the comically large pot alongside the items you want the golem to be made out of and then put in a piece of paper detailing the specifications of the golem you want to be made. Then bury it all with any kind of dirt and water 2 times morning and night for 7 days in a spot where it can receive sunlight and then dig up your ready golem from the dirt! You can make the process faster by using energy-rich soil.

title: Kiriichimonji
description: #Akame Ga Kill - A katana that creates wounds that refuse to heal by normal means, you need healing of at least Epic level to heal a wound inflicted by Kiriichimonji.

title: Water Dragon Sword
description: #Akame Ga Kill - An ancient longsword that resembles a dragon, there are two fangs on the hilt of the sword, and if the user stabs their body on the fangs they gain massively enhanced physical stats and minor draconic characteristics for 3 minutes, after the 3 minutes wear off the user becomes extremely tired and fatigued.

title: Incursio
description: #Akame Ga Kill - In its dormant state the Incursio resembles a short sword that can be activated into a white armor that completely covers the user and grants them enhanced physical stats as well as the ability to turn invisible for a duration. But the true strength of the Incursio lies in its ability to adapt and become stronger, so the longer you use it the stronger it will become and acquire new forms.

title: Demon Extract
description: #Akame Ga Kill - An incredibly powerful extract created from the blood of a mythical beast. Drinking the blood from this chalice grants the user the Legendary Rank Ability: Demon's Extract but if their willpower is not strong enough they will be driven insane by the power.

title: Perfector
description: #Akame Ga Kill - A pair of gloves that gives their user almost perfect dexterity and speed for their fingers and hands, allowing them to move with extreme speed and precision beyond the realm of human speeds.

title: Ring of the Paladin
description: #An enchanted ring worn by a legendary paladin, now infused with his prayers. This ring can hold a total of 3 charges and recovers a charge every hour. You can spend a charge to cast a Rare tier Heal on yourself or a target, grant a target any one Uncommon tier blessing like strength or agility or you can bless an object with holy energy to either create holy water or create a temporarily blessed weapon effective against the unholy.

title: Yatsufusa
description: #Akame Ga Kill - A katana with the ability to reanimate undead to serve as their puppets, only 8 undead can be maintained at a time and the undead are in the same state as they have died, they cannot learn any new skills but they maintain all the skills they had in their life. In addition, for every undead animated the user loses a portion of their own strength.

title: Spectator
description: #Akame Ga Kill - A mechanical third that manifests on the user's forehead, this eye can be used to read the surface of targets you are focused on, see through walls and clothing, have perfectly clear vision and clairvoyance as well as combat precognition by reading minute muscles movements in targets bodies.

title: Murasame
description: #Akame Ga Kill - A cursed blade that inflicts a killing curse on whatever it cuts, once cut the curse markings will originate from where the cut is placed and move towards the heart before stopping it. This can be resisted by cutting off the inflicted area, having resistance to curses, or being stronger than the blade.

title: Amulet of Imitation
description: #An amulet that lets you transform into the shape of whatever creature you touch while also holding the amulet, you will be in the form of the creature until you dispel the transformation. Cooldown: 8 Hours

title: Balzac
description: #Akame Ga Kill - When worn, Balzac can tap into the wearer's body and mind and unlock their potential by 100%, giving the wearer super speed, super strength, lightning-quick agility, and unparalleled intelligence. After all of the wearer's potential is unlocked, it cannot exceed that person's limits. Wearing it for an extended amount of time can cause extreme exhaustion.

title: Black Marlin
description: #Akame Ga Kill - The user can control any liquid around themselves, including water and blood with simple hand gestures by expending their energy/mana. However, it only functions in the presence of water or any other form of liquid around. Oftentimes, the water takes the shape of serpents or dragons.

title: Charismatic Sunglasses
description: #A pair of really cool-looking sunglasses that make you seem more charismatic. Are the sunglasses charismatic because they look cool or do they look cool because they make you more charismatic?

title: Sword of Judgement
description: #Hota - A sword blessed by the divine that imbues its user with great might and magical power. But it also fills them with righteous rage, making them berserk against unholy and undead beings unless they can tame the sword. Boosts the power of holy and light abilities when used as a focus.

title: Armageddon Blade
description: #Hota - The blade of Armageddon in myths. This sword imbues its user with great power but burns to touch, the user can expend their energy to call down armageddon, a swarm of hellfire raining down from the skies onto the mortal world.  Boosts the power of fire and unholy abilities when used as a focus.

title: Sword of Hellfire
description: #Hota - A sword forged and bathed in hellfire, the user can expend their energy to cover the blade in violent flames. Boosts the power of fire abilities when used as a focus.

title: Angellic Alliance
description: #Hota - A divine artifact of the heavens. Wielding this sword greatly increases the user's physical and magical abilities, in addition, any army or ally under the user's command also becomes stronger and is imbued with powerful morale. You can also expend your own energy to grant any blessing at Rare tier or below, Boosts the power of holy and light abilities when used as a focus.

title: Titans Thunder
description: #Hota - A sword of thunder that grants its user the power and might of the giants. It grants its user extreme physical strength and the ability to rain down thunder by expending their own energy. Enhances the power of lightning-based abilities when used as a focus.

title: Armor of the Dammed
description: #Hota - A pitch-black armor with a demonic visage used by the most wicked of conquerors. This armor, while augmenting the user's physical abilities, also allows them to unleash a variety of curses on a massive scale such as slow, misfortune, weakness, etc. to debilitate entire armies with training. Amplifies the power of darkness-based abilities when used as a focus.

title: Power of the Dragon Father
description: #Hota - An armor crafted from the corpse of a mighty dragon. Wearing it imbues the wearer with great physical might and extreme resistance to magic thanks to the scales of the dragon.

title: Spellbinders Hat
description: #Hota - A hat worn by a legendary archwizard, containing echoes of the spells he used to cast. When worn grants you the ability to cast the spells: Dimensional Door, a portal with a range of 100 km, Fly: Allowing you to soar through the skies at the same speed as your land speed, Magic Mirror: Allows you to reflect a magic effect back at an enemy. Implosion: Deals severe damage to an enemy by engulfing them in an explosion, and Summon Elemental: Allowing you to summon an elemental of your choice with power roughly similar to yours for 30 minutes. This artifact holds 3 charges at a time and recovers a charge every 8 hours.

title: Admirals Hat
description: #Hota - The hat of a legendary admiral. Allows you to conjure and summon any mundane seabound vessel manned by a crew of spirits. It can be a destroyer-class warship or a cruise ship. You can summon a vessel every 720 Hours, in addition, when wearing the hat you gain Master rank Riding when riding any seasbound vessel.

title: Cloak of Silence
description: #Hota - When worn, the cloak prevents the user from using any magic below Epci Rank but at the same time, prevents any magic below Epic rank from being used on them.

title: Cape of Velocity
description: #Hota - A cape that makes the wearer faster when worn.

title: Cloak of the Undead King
description: #Hota - A cloak of the legendary undead king. When worn, boosts the power of all necromancy and soul-based abilities and removes the limit on the amount of undead the user can control at once.

title: Charm of Eclipse
description: #Hota - A mystical charm that amits an aura that causes people around the user to suffer from magical interference, reducing their magical capabilities.

title: Wizards Well
description: #Hota - A large cauldron that is filled to the brim with magical power equal to the maximum of the user. At 8 am every morning this cauldron is instantly filled back to the brim once more.

title: Orb of Silt
description: #Hota - An orb containing raw ancient magical power that boosts the power of earth-based abilities and magic of those who hold it.

title: Orb of Firmament
description: #Hota - An orb containing raw ancient magical power that boosts the power of wind and lightning-based abilities and magic of those who hold it.

title: Orb of Driving Rain
description: #Hota - An orb containing raw ancient magical power that boosts the power of water and ice-based abilities and magic of those who hold it.

title: Orb of Tempenstous Fire
description: #Hota - An orb containing raw ancient magical power that boosts the power of fire-based abilities and magic of those who hold it.

title: Tome of Air
description: #Hota - A legendary tome from an ancient kingdom that is imbued with magic, allowing whoever holds it to cast the spells it contains within even without training. You can also learn the spells yourself through study to cast them without the assistance of the book. Spell List: https://heroes.thelazy.net/index.php/School_of_Air_Magic

title: Tome of Earth
description: #Hota - A legendary tome from an ancient kingdom that is imbued with magic, allowing whoever holds it to cast the spells it contains within even without training. You can also learn the spells yourself through study to cast them without the assistance of the book. Spell List: https://heroes.thelazy.net/index.php/School_of_Earth_Magic

title: Tome of Water
description: #Hota - A legendary tome from an ancient kingdom that is imbued with magic, allowing whoever holds it to cast the spells it contains within even without training. You can also learn the spells yourself through study to cast them without the assistance of the book. Spell List: https://heroes.thelazy.net/index.php/School_of_Water_Magic

title: Tome of Fire
description: #Hota - A legendary tome from an ancient kingdom that is imbued with magic, allowing whoever holds it to cast the spells it contains within even without training. You can also learn the spells yourself through study to cast them without the assistance of the book. Spell List: https://heroes.thelazy.net/index.php/School_of_Fire_Magic

title: Sphere of Permanence
description: #Hota - A magical orb that prevents the removal of magic on a target, you are immune to spells or abilities that dispel.

title: Orb of Vulnerability
description: #Hota - A magical orb that allows the user to bypass immunities and resistances, you can hurt living fire or poison a hydra as long as you hold this orb.

title: Angel Feather Arrows
description: #Hota - A quiver of infinite arrows fletched with the feathers of angels, these arrows do not get slower from flying and retain their maximum speed when flying until they hit a target.

title: Vial of Lifeblood
description: #Hota - A vial containing condensed vitality in the form of blood, drinking it grants enhanced vitality, a minor healing factor, and an increased lifespan.

title: Elixir of Life
description: #Hota - The legendary Elixir of Life, drinking it grants boundless vitality, immunity to most poisons and illnesses, and a lifespan increasing a hundredfold.

title: Endless Purse of Gold
description: #Hota - A purse filled with endless riches, every 24 hours, 500 200-gram pure gold goins fill this bag and the bag can hold an infinite amount of these coins.

title: Horn of the Abyss
description: #Hota - A horn from the deep, abyssal depths with eldrich power. This horn can raise the dead as shoggoths, fangarms, or other creatures from the depths that are loyal to you.

title: Archmages Robes
description: #Robes worn by an archmage that is suspiciously comfortable. Wearing this robe lets you learn magic much quicker and amplifies the power of the spells you cast.

title: Altar of Fire
description: #HOTA - An altar of fire that collects mana from nature to give birth to spirits of fire, as the owner of the altar these elementals are naturally loyal to you.

title: Altar of Air
description: #HOTA - An altar of fire that collects mana from nature to give birth to spirits of air and lightning, as the owner of the altar these elementals are naturally loyal to you.

title: Altar of Water
description: #HOTA - An altar of fire that collects mana from nature to give birth to spirits of water and ice, as the owner of the altar these elementals are naturally loyal to you.

title: Altar of Earth
description: #HOTA - An altar of fire that collects mana from nature to give birth to spirits of earth, as the owner of the altar these elementals are naturally loyal to you.

title: Elemental Conflux
description: #HOTA - An altar that converges natural elements and collects mana from nature to give birth to spirits of all kinds of elements, as the owner of the altar these elementals are naturally loyal to you.

title: Pyre
description: #HOTA - An altar of ash that is capable of giving birth to firebirds and phoenixes if sacrificed enough wealth and energy. As the owner of the pyre, the phoenixes are naturally loyal to you.

title: Dragon's Hoard
description: #- A cave that contains the ideal condition for a dragon to live, plenty of treasure. You can either take the gold and precious gems inside for your own use or use the cave as a storage for your own valuables, no one can enter your horde without your permission.

title: Dragon Utopia
