description: #HOTA - A gigantic castle that houses a horde of dragons of various species that are loyal to you as the owner of the Utopia, the utopia is the ideal living conditions for practically any dragon, you can allow other dragons to also join in exchange for servitude.

title: Hydra Pond
description: #HOTA - A large swampy pond populated by Hydra, the pond itself is incredibly poisonous but the Hydra inside are naturally loyal to you as the owner of the pond.

title: Nymph Waterfall
description: #HOTA - A waterfall populated by lesser Nymphs, spirits of water, the waterfall itself is magical in nature, and nymphs are naturally born inside of it. Nymphs produced by the waterfall are naturally loyal to you as the owner of the waterfall.

title: Maelstrom
description: #HOTA - A large whirlpool of water containing a large concentration of dangerous seabound creatures including the sea serpent Haspid under your command

title: Magic Forest
description: #HOTA - A large patch of forest with a high concentration of magical power and unique herbs that grow inside. This forest is populated by creatures like ents, treants, and even legendary unicorns under your command. This forest slowly replenishes itself over time.

title: Crystal Cave
description: #HOTA - A large cavern filled with unique red crystals containing potent magical power and energy, in addition, there are crystal dragons inside of the cavern under your command. The crystals in the cave replenish over time.

title: Frozen Cliffs
description: #HOTA - A gigantic frozen mountain range even taller than Everest is home to extreme amounts of magical energy and houses a variety of powerful dragons and even the legendary azure dragon that will serve under your command.

title: Cloud Temple
description: #HOTA - A gigantic temple Over a kilometer tall and several wide, by giving sacrifices to the cloud temple like energy and wealth you can summon giants and titans of stone to serve under your command,

title: Experimental Shop
description: #HOTA - A giant experimental workshop manned by the most talented gremlin master artisans and workers loyal to you, these gremlins can create items for you with their tools and skills as long as you provide them with the resources, they are also capable of building animated legendary giants of stone and golems of several varieties to serve under your command

title: Portal of Glory
description: #HOTA - A divine gate that over time produces angels to serve under your command, to produce an angel you must give the portal enough energy and resources such as gold.

title: Garden of Revelations
description: #A garden filled with a variety of beautiful flowers and has a mystical aura around it, inside the garden it is easier to study and learn magic.

title: Fountain of Youth
description: #A large ornate fountain whose waters have the property of reversing aging the more one bathes inside of it, every hour spent inside is a year of your biological clock rewound

title: Magic Spring
description: #HOTA - A large spring that is filled with mana rich water that replenishes itself at a rapid pace, taking a bath in the spring is said to replenish magical power very quickly.

title: Marika's Hammer
description: #Elden Ring - A partially broken stone hammer that is still supernaturally durable, it has the property of boosting the power of holy abilities and spells.

title: Sacrificial Doll
description: #A simple doll made of straw and twine, this doll can be substituted for any kind of sacrifice, after which it vanishes. Works for human sacrifice, wealth sacrifice, sacrificing a part of yourself or even a part of your soul. Restock Timer: 10 Days

title: Relic Gold
description: #A gold coin that is perceived as something of incredible value in the eyes of anyone who sees it while not having any real use. You could trade it for a real artifact and the one you gave it to would still find it a fair deal.

title: Stack of Gold Bars
description: #A stack of ordinary gold bars weighing a total of 33 kilograms.

title: Greedy Ring
description: #An ornate red and gold that attracts wealth to its wearer, making it easier for them to make money and find treasures.

title: Gold Ring Gift
description: #Æ Gold Ring that you can give as a gift to a loved one. The patterns of the ring customize themselves according to whoever you give them to.  Restock Timer: 48 Hours

title: Chlorophyte Bar
description: #Calamity Mod - A refined bar of Chlorophyte that grew from the deep ancient jungles, it is incredibly flexible and durable, far more than any mundane metal, and is also capable of converting sunlight into energy, synergizes very well with bio and nature abilities. Restock Timer: 8 Hours

title: Aerolite Bar
description: #Calamity Mod - A refined bar of Aerilite from the sky islands infused with sky energy, when infused with energy this one is capable of releasing wind and even emulating weather effects under special conditions, it also synergizes very well with lightning and air. Restock Timer: 8 hours

title: Astral Bar
description: #Calamity Mod - A refined bar crafted out of the depths of the Astral Infection, a bar containing refined cosmic energy that is nigh breakable, when infused with energy it is capable of releasing cosmic energies. Restock Timer: 8 Hours

title: Broken Biome Blade
description: #Calamity Mod - A broken sword handle that can be infused with energy to produce a blade with the properties of the element it is infused with

title: Roxcalibur
description: #Calamity Mod - The legendary sword in the stone, except you couldn't pull it out, no worries, just bring the sword along with you as a bludgeoning weapon. If you meet all of the original conditions of the Excalibur you can pull the sword out of the stone and get both the Excalibur and an unbreakable rock

title: Sahara Slicers
description: #Calamity Mod - A pair of arid daggers that allows you to manifest 10 arid shivs every 30 seconds that you can send as a volley against your opponents

title: Unbreakable Blade
description: #A simple sharp steel longsword that is completely unbreakable and undamagable.

title: Bag of Endless Coins
description: #A bag that produces 1000 gold coins every day.

title: Endless Bag of Ninja Supplies
description: #A bag the size of a satchel that contains 100 shurikens, 100 kunai, 100 caltrops, 50 explosive tags, and a Katana all made out of high quality steel that replenishes itself every 24 hours.

title: Portable Supercomputer
description: #A laptop with computational power on par with humanity's strongest supercomputers and is always connected to the native internet of the world regardless of location.

title: Bag of Ore
description: #A duffel bag the size of an average human's torso that you can pull 33 kilograms of any mundane ore out of every 24 hours.

title: Portable Pharmacy
description: #A simple satchel that you can pull out any item that you could otherwise find at an average pharmacy.

title: Droid Factory
description: #(Tech)Star Wars - An autonomous factory that produces Star Wars droids as long you can provide it with materials.

title: Flowing Water Crushing Rock Fist Manual
description: #One Punch Man - A book containing detailed instructions on how to train in the art of Flowing Water Crushing Rock Fist created by Bang. Those without the manual cannot replicate the martial arts.

title: Grimoire of Izalith
description: #Dark Souls - A Grimoire that allows its reader to learn the Pyromancies of the Great Swamp and Izalith. Spell List: https://darksouls.fandom.com/wiki/Pyromancy_(Dark_Souls)

title: Tome of the Way of the White
description: #Dark Souls - A tome that allows its reader to learn the miracles of the Way of the White, this Tome was written by Rhea of Thorulund, allowing you to learn all of her miracles. | Spell List: https://darksouls.fandom.com/wiki/Reah_of_Thorolund#Miracles

title: Tome of Orbeck
description: #Dark Souls - A magical tome containing research and anecdotes written by Orbeck of Vinheim allowing you to learn all of his spells. | Spell List: https://darksouls.fandom.com/wiki/Orbeck_of_Vinheim#Wares

title: Rites of the Dragon Communion
description: #Elden Ring - Church Rites detailing how one can commune with the great dragons, studying the rites allows communion with dragons, allowing the user to borrow their powers to conjure miracles. Spell List: https://eldenring.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragon+Communion+Incantations

title: Rites of the Dragon Cult
description: #Elden Ring - Rites of the Dragon Cult, studying these allows one to learn of the miracles performed by the dragon cult by imitating the power of the great dragons. Spell List: https://eldenring.wiki.fextralife.com/Dragon+Cult+Incantations

title: Capsule Case
description: #(Tech)Dragon Ball - A case containing 20 capsules made by Capsule Corp. The capsules contain a House, fridge, oven, large quantities of preserved foods, a boat, a high tech motorcycle, etc. Any slightly upgraded mundane appliance or vehicle is a capsule in this case. Restock timer 48 hours.

title: Rites of the Edtree
description: #Elden Ring - Rites of the old ones who used to worship the ancient Erdtree. Studying these rites allows learning of the miracles of the Erdtree. Spell List: https://eldenring.wiki.fextralife.com/Erdtree+Incantations

title: Grimoire of Spatial Magic
description: #Black Cover - A book containing the secrets of Spatial Magic from the Clover Kingdom, allowing those who study it to learn and utilize the spells it contains inside. Spell List: https://blackclover.fandom.com/wiki/Spatial_Magic

title: Grimoire of Lightning Magic
description: #Black Cover - A book containing the secrets of Lightning Magic from the Clover Kingdom, allowing those who study it to learn and utilize the spells it contains inside. Spell List: https://blackclover.fandom.com/wiki/Lightning_Magic

title: Grimoire of Water Magic
description: #Black Cover - A book containing the secrets of Water Magic from the Clover Kingdom, allowing those who study it to learn and utilize the spells it contains inside. Spell List: https://blackclover.fandom.com/wiki/Water_Magic

title: Grimoire of Ice Magic
description: #Black Cover - A book containing the secrets of Ice Magic from the Clover Kingdom, allowing those who study it to learn and utilize the spells it contains inside. Spell List: https://blackclover.fandom.com/wiki/Ice_Magic

title: Grimoire of Darkness Magic
description: #Black Cover - A book containing the secrets of Darkness Magic from the Clover Kingdom, allowing those who study it to learn and utilize the spells it contains inside. Spell List: https://blackclover.fandom.com/wiki/Dark_Magic

title: Grimoire of Light Magic
description: #Black Cover - A book containing the secrets of Light Magic from the Clover Kingdom, allowing those who study it to learn and utilize the spells it contains inside. Spell List: https://blackclover.fandom.com/wiki/Light_Magic

title: Familiar Contract
description: #A contract that allows those who sign it to become registered in your gacha as a familiar that you can treat like any other familiar. They must sign the contract while knowing what it does otherwise it does not work.

title: Master Blacksmith Commision
description: #Rip this ticket to get transported to the forge of a master blacksmith who you can commission to make any piece of equipment for you as long as you provide them with the material, after finishing the deal, you will be transported back and receive your commissioned item back in 7 at the latest. The blacksmith is not a god so there are limits to what they can make. Restock Timer: 360 Hours

title: Giant Ominous Floating Obsidian Sphere
description: #A gigantic ball of pure obsidian that always floats 100 meters above the ground, its radius is 5km wide and it constantly emits a pitch humming sound that can be heard from over 50km in distance. That's all.

title: Beauty Perfume
description: #A bottle of pink perfume that amplifies your attractiveness to the opposite gender.

title: Bellowing Dragoncrest Ring
description: #Dark Souls - A special ring granted to only the most accomplished sorcerers at the Vinheim Dragon School. The ring is engraved with an everlasting dragon and boosts the strength of magic cast by its wearer.

title: Dusk Crown Ring
description: #Dark Souls - This magic crown-shaped ring was granted to Princess Dusk of Oolacile upon her birth. The wearer will lose a portion of their vitality that is converted into their energy/mana, increasing the potency of their abilities and spells.

title: Great Swamp Ring
description: #Dark Souls - Ring said to be chiseled from the bone of a flame salamander by blighted Pyromancers living in the Great Swamp. It bolsters flames wielded by its wearer, increasing the potency of fire based abilities and spells.

title: Chaos Witch's Ring
description: #The Witch of Izalith and her daughters, scorched by the Flame of Chaos, taught humans the art of pyromancy and offered them this ring. It greatly bolsters flames wielded by its wearer, increasing the potency of fire based abilities and spells.

title: Sage's Ring
description: #Dark Souls - A ring given to Farron's Undead Legion by one of the preacher twins, known more commonly as the Crystal Sages. It makes it easier to learn and cast spells while wearing the ring, reducing the energy costs of spells.

title: Sahelanthropus
description: #Metal Gear - A nuclear armed bipedal humanoid tank designed for warfare containing a variety of weaponry for combat, this one has been modified to make space for a human operator. This metal gear possesses a high power railgun, guided missile launchers, retractable flexible nanofiber high frequency blades, and independently operating high tech sensory drones that can deploy explosives, flamethrowers, and high caliber machine guns. In addition, its armor is made of depleted uranium that can be enriched by its internal reactor and detonated to cause a nuclear explosion. All ammo and missiles etc. restock every 24 hours. This machine also self repairs itself via Nanomachines.

title: Twilight Healing
description: #DxD - A sacred gear created by god. Twilight Healing manifests as a pair of ornate rings that allows its user to convert their own energy into neutral healing energy that can heal others or yourself, potency depends on how much energy you expend.

title: Gravity Jail
description: #DxD - A sacred gear created by god. The Magical Eyes that Shackles, the Gravity Jail manifests in the user's eyes indicated by them glowing, allowing you to expend your energy to increase gravity on any location or target in your line of sight. When taken out of the inventory, it manifests as a marble that fuses with whoever swallows it.

title: Boosted Gear
description: #DxD - One of the Longinus created by God. The Gauntlet of the Red Dragon Emperor houses the soul of Ddraig, the Heavenly Dragon of Domination. This gauntlet allows its user to amplify their stats by expanding their stamina, the higher the level of boost, the higher the level of stamina expenditure.

title: Divine Dividing
description: #DxD - One of the Longinus created by God. The Wings of the White Dragon Emperor house the soul of Albion, the Heavenly Dragon of Supremacy. These wings allow its user to fly and divide the magical power of enemies and add it to their own reserves to replenish their energy, excess energy is released through the wings.

title: Holy Collider
description: #Calamity Mod - A sword carved from the corpse of the profaned god, capable of emitting explosions of divine flame upon contact, and releasing holy flames by expending the user's energy. In addition, holy and fire abilities are amplified when using this sword as a focus.

title: Jackall & Casull
description: #Hellsing - A pair of incredibly unwieldy pistols wielded by a certain vampire that resemble hand canons more than regular pistols. Casull is white and Jackall is black, these guns are too heavy for a normal person to wield and each holds 6 rounds of 13mm blessed silver exploding rounds. One needs to have supernatural strength to not get their arms ripped off by pulling the trigger. You are also provided with 2 magazines for these guns every 24 hours.

title: Dragon Slayer
description: #Berserk - "It was too big to be called a sword. Massive, thick, heavy, and far too rough. Indeed, it was a heap of raw iron." A massive dull unwieldy sword larger than a man, this sword is supernaturally durable and having bathed in the blood of countless spirits and astral beings is capable of harming and killing the immaterial.

title: Wastelanders Survival Kit
description: #(Tech)Fallout - A survival kit containing the loadout of a true courier. Containing an Elite Riot Gear, A fully modified Anti-Material Sniper Rifle, a Riot Shotgun, A .44 Magnum revolver, A bowie knife, 5 repair kits, 10 stim packs, 5 doctors bags, and 200 ammo for each weapon. No way to be caught lacking in the wastes now.

title: The Courier's Stash
description: #(Tech)Fallout - A stash every courier needs to have around just in case they get robbed, shot in the head and left for the dead. This large briefcase contains a lightweight metal armour, a double-barrel shotgun with 20 packs of 20 shells, 4 basic repair kits, and 5 stim packs.

title: Hei Gui Stealth Suit
description: #(Tech)Fallout - A special armour designed by China made for infiltration and stealth missions given to special units. In addition to its dense armour and mesh, the stealth suit is capable of emitting a forcefield that bends light around it to make the user invisible.

title: Feng Shui Engine
description: #Street Fighter - An advanced prosthetic eye that houses a miniature Tandem Engine, allowing it to generate extreme amounts of Artificial Qi to massively enhance all of the user's physical abilities. However overuse may cause strain.

title: Enma
description: #One Piece - A masterpiece sword once wielded by the legendary Kozuki Oden. This sword has a will of its own and has the ability to release the wielder's energy like a burst of power. But at the same, before the sword is tamed it will try to forcefully drain the user's energy and constantly release it.

title: Shusui
description: #One Piece - A masterpiece sword once wielded by the mythical samurai Ryuma, this sword's blade has permanently blackened from absorbing Ryuma's hardening over time. This sword is nigh unbreakable, sharper than a razor and is an excellent conductor of energy.

title: Pip-Boy 3000
description: #(Tech)Fallout - The Pip-Boy, otherwise known as the Personal Information processor, is a more versatile and robust computer that is worn on the wrist and powered by an internal fission battery. Pip Boy is capable of autonomously monitoring the health of its wearer, connecting to networks, map areas, shining light etc. An all-around solid multitool.

title: Power Fist
description: #(Tech)Fallout - A pneumatic standard power fist that can help the average Joe put a crater on the wall with their fist. The power fist adds a static power boost to your punches to the level of a superhuman. But in the hands of someone who is already a superhuman, it is not too helpful.

title: Rasaka's Fang
description: #Solo Levelling - A dagger carved from the venomous fang of Rasaka, this dagger is perpetually imbued with venom that afflicts whoever it cuts with paralysis and makes the wounds harder to heal.

title: Rasaka's Venom
description: #Solo Levelling - A pouch containing the refined venom of Rasaka, ingesting it completely grants you increased physical resistance in exchange for weakening your muscles. With poison resistance, you can resist the latter part.

title: Knight Killer
description: #Solo Levelling - A large dagger made for dealing with heavily armoured opponents, the stronger the armour an opponent is wearing, the more damage the dagger deals.

title: Baruka's Dagger
description: #Solo Levelling - A large dagger wielded by a frost elf chieftain. In addition to being extremely durable and sharp, this dagger increases the potency of ice and cold abilities that use it as a focus.

title: Demon King's Longsword
description: #Solo Levelling - A giant sword wielded by the demon king that has the ability to summon devastating thunderstorms from its blade with each swing. The stronger its user the stronger the lightning storms are.

title: Kamish's Wrath
description: #Solo Levelling - A pair of dragons made of the dragon Kamish, they are nigh unbreakable and sharper than any manmade blade. In addition, these blades synchronize with the user's mana and adjust their strength accordingly. The user can also increase their weight at will.

title: Costume Wardrobe
description: #A regular-looking closet containing an infinite amount of clothes ranging from lingerie, formal wear, cosplay etc. As long as the clothes are completely mundane you can pull any clothing weighing less than 5kg from it, and the clothes that will come out will be according to the desires of whoever reaches inside. Only 50 outfits can be taken out per day.

title: Teleportation Amulet
description: #An ornate platinum amulet that allows its wearer to teleport anywhere they can see with a 1-minute cooldown.

title: Divine Crucifix
description: #A holy cross crucifix blessed by a divine spirit, being in its presence immensely weakens any unholy and dark being and instantly kills weaker ones. Any holy or light ability channelled through it is increased in potency.

title: Telepathic Implant
description: #(Tech)Invincible - A neural implant that allows the wearer to communicate two ways with a target in their range of perception. Can only communicate with one target at a time. This item manifests as a ticket that when torn automatically installs itself in your head.

title: Ripperdoc Ticket
description: #(Tech)Cyberpunk 2077 - A ticket that when torn, transfers you over to the clinic of a mechanical Ripperdoc that you can request to install implants from Cyberpunk 2077 or ones that you bring in yourself into you for the right price. Beware, while top quality, his wares are rather expensive and you may need to barter. The moment you leave the clinic you are transported back to where you came from and you can only spend 24 hours inside the clinic. Restock Timer: 15 Days

title: Clover Amulet
description: #A golden amulet with a jade engraved into the shape of a 4-leaf clover that grants the user good luck.

title: Holy Antidote
description: #A vial containing a powerful holy antidote that can cure all diseases and ailments below the Legendary rank. Restock Timer: 7 Days

title: Sandevistan
description: #(Tech)Cyberpunk 2077 - A cybernetic spine replacement augment that allows the user to massively increase their perception of time, making time slow around them in exchange for taxing their brain. Overuse may cause brain damage.

title: Omni Phone
description: #A mobile phone that has everything you need, being able to connect to a network regardless of size, more storage space than you can count in numbers, a firewall that would take a machine got an aeon to crack and enough processing power to make a supercomputer blush.

title: Ender Pearl
description: #Minecraft - A round crystalline pearl containing spatial energies, when thrown by someone, it teleports them to wherever the pearl breaks on. Restock Timer: 8 Hours

title: Character Card Wolverine
description: #A character card that allows you to give yourself or another the full healing factor of Wolverine for 10 minutes. 3 uses.

title: Bronze Heart Ticket
description: #Apparently, they sell even affection nowadays. Just think of the person you want to affect and rip the ticket, making them like you slightly more. Is it mind control? Nope, retroactive reality and probability bending. No unwanted side effects.

title: Silver Heart Ticket
description: #Apparently, they sell even affection nowadays. Just think of the person you want to affect and rip the ticket, making them like you more. Is it mind control? Nope, retroactive reality and probability bending. No unwanted side effects.

title: Gold Heart Ticket
description: #Apparently, they sell even affection nowadays. Just think of the person you want to affect and rip the ticket, making them like you a lot more. Is it mind control? Nope, retroactive reality and probability bending. No unwanted side effects.

title: Royal Heart Ticket
description: #Apparently, they sell even affection nowadays. Just think of the person you want to affect and rip the ticket, making them like you considerably more. Is it mind control? Nope, retroactive reality and probability bending. No unwanted side effects.

title: Cupid's Ticket
description: #Apparently, they sell even affection nowadays. Just think of the person you want to affect and rip the ticket, making them fall in love with you. Is it mind control? Nope, retroactive reality and probability bending. No unwanted side effects.

title: Auto Doc
description: #(Tech)Fallout - An automatic autonomous advanced doctor station created in big MT. by Doctor Mobius. This large capsule can perform even the most complicated medical procedures with almost perfect expertise with simple instructions. Just hook it up to any sufficient power source.

title: Blight Spewer
description: #(Tech)Calamity Mod - A technologically advanced flamethrower that spews clouds of Plauge Nanomachines that seek out flesh and quickly devour it from the inside out. The nanomachines quickly disintegrate after a few seconds as a safety precaution.

title: Shadethrower
description: #(Tech)Calamity Mod - A modified flamethrower that turns regular burnable fuel into corrupted flames that rot whatever they burn rapidly.

title: Heavenly Gale
description: #Calamity Mod - A divine bow crafted from the essences of earth and cosmos. Whatever arrow is notched onto this bow is converted into Exotic resonance crystals. The arrows summon down resonant lightning wherever it strikes, powerful enough to flay even gods alive and rend the surface world.

title: Telluric Gale
description: #Calamity Mod - A bow crafted from the remains of the profaned goddess. Whatever arrow is nocked onto this bow is converted into powerful scorching bolts of divine holy flames powered by the user's energy.

title: The Storm
description: #Calamity Mod - A bow carved from the remains of the storm weaver, this bow can convert any arrow nocked into it into a bolt of lightning which scales with the power of its wielder.

title: Hoarfrost Bow
description: #Calamity Mod - A mystical bow made from the essence of the frozen castle that turns any arrow nocked to its string into one made of freezing mist which scales with the power of its wielder.

title: Lunarian Bow
description: #Calamity Mod - A bow crafted from the elements of the natural world, the user is capable of converting their own energy into energy arrows to shoot out of the bow with.

title: Pheonix Feather
description: #Black Souls - "Enraged by the haughty bird, god picked its wings clean" placing this feather on top of a corpse whose soul still exists and is not above legendary rank will revive them in exchange for burning the feather. Restock Timer: 720 hours

title: Grimm Pool
description: #RWBY - A large jar containing evil black goop that summons lesser Grimm once it lands on a stable surface. The summoned lesser Grimm are loyal to you.

title: The Stand Arrow
description: #JoJo - An ornate arrow made out of a meteorite from outer space, those stabbed by this arrow are infected by it, either slowly succumbing to a severe fever or having enough willpower and potential to survive and awaken a stand(Roll a Platinum Ticket to decide which stand gets awakened in the target.)

title: Wolverine's Skeleton
description: #Marvel - Wolverine's Adamantium Bonded Skeleton freshly picked off of his body as he was sleeping. As the skeleton is bonded with Adamantium it is virtually unbreakable albeit a bit short. Don't worry about a Wolverine regenerating from it as all genetic material has been scrubbed clean.

title: Nano Machine heart
description: #(Tech)Metal Gear Rising Revengance - A super high-tech nanomachine heart that belonged to Senator Armstrong. By having this heart implanted in you, it gives you access to powerful nanomachines that enhance your physiology massively, allow you to absorb other nanomachines, drain electricity to charge itself and harden in response to physical trauma or on command.

title: Danzo's Right Arm
description: #Naruto - Danzo's Right Arm torn fresh off of the torso in mint condition. This right arm is made up of Hashirama cells and implanted with 10 sharingans. You can either implant this arm onto your own body to enjoy the benefits of Sharingan and Hashirama cells or dismantle it to use all parts separately.

title: Hashirama Cells
description: #Naruto - A vial containing the living cells of Hashirama Senju, due to the sheer potency of Hashirama's genetics if you successfully manage to implant these cells in your body, they will increase your vitality and energy reserves considerably. Not only that but they also grant you considerable passive regenerative ability that consumes your energy.

title: Rinnegan
description: #Naruto - A pair of Rinnegan plucked fresh off of Nagato's body contained in preserving fluid. These eyes can be surgically implanted in yourself or others to gain access to their abilities. Beware, you will need a lot of energy to handle them.

title: Fire Release Jutsu Scroll
description: #Naruto - A large scroll containing information on all Fire Release Jutsu recorded inside up to A rank that allows the user to study and train to learn the Fire Jutsu that are recorded inside. Those without the user's permission cannot understand what is inside the scroll.

title: Water Release Jutsu Scroll
description: #Naruto - A large scroll containing information on all Water Release Jutsu recorded inside up to A rank that allows the user to study and train to learn the Water Jutsu that are recorded inside. Those without the user's permission cannot understand what is inside the scroll.

title: Wind Release Jutsu Scroll
description: #Naruto - A large scroll containing information on all Wind Release Jutsu recorded inside up to A rank that allows the user to study and train to learn the Wind Jutsu that are recorded inside. Those without the user's permission cannot understand what is inside the scroll.

title: Earth Release Jutsu Scroll
description: #Naruto - A large scroll containing information on all Earth Release Jutsu recorded inside up to A rank that allows the user to study and train to learn the Earth Jutsu that are recorded inside. Those without the user's permission cannot understand what is inside the scroll.

title: Lightning Release Jutsu Scroll
description: #Naruto - A large scroll containing information on all Lightning Release Jutsu recorded inside up to A rank that allows the user to study and train to learn the Lightning Jutsu that are recorded inside. Those without the user's permission cannot understand what is inside the scroll.

title: T-51b Power Armor
description: #(Tech)Fallout - A set of power armour developed before the Great War and mass-produced for soldiers to wear. This power armour is strong enough to shrug off low-calibre bullets and allow the average man to lift a car overhead. The power armour is powered by a fusion core that gets replaced by a new one every 24 hours.

title: Gene Seed Ticket
description: #(Tech)Warhammer 40k - A ticket that when ripped transports you to a room full of robotic surgeons that allow you to undergo the creation procedure of a Transhuman Astartes. This procedure is perfected and you will end up with the augments of an Astartes regardless without the downsides. This procedure will not affect your looks or the general shape of your body due to being perfected.

title: Justice's Shades
description: #Helltaker - A pair of cool shades belonging to the blind demon. When wearing these shades you are able to tell when someone speaking to you thinks they are lying to you.

title: E-11 medium blaster rifle
description: #(Tech)Star Wars - A standard issue arm of a Stormtrooper, these high-tech rifles shoot bolts of high heat energy that are strong enough to kill the average light armoured target in one shot and blast apart concrete. It has three settings Lethal, stun and sting and its cartridge holds 500 shots. You get a new cartridge every day.

title: Soul Solid
description: #One Piece - A cane sword belonging to Brook of the Straw Hat Pirates. This sword is extremely sharp and durable, not having dulled even after years of use. It is also extremely dapper.

title: Wado Ichimonji
description: #One Piece - A great-grade katana crafted by a master blacksmith in Wano. This sword is extremely sharp and absurdly durable, the perfect pick for any swordsman. In addition, this sword is great at channelling energy after years of use, making abilities using it as a channel cost slightly less energy.

title: Tozama
description: #JJK - A basic cursed tool in the form of a short sword. The sword sword is sharp and durable while also being able to interact with and harm spiritual beings.

title: Split Soul Katana
description: #JJK - A powerful cursed tool in the form of a large Japanese Broadsword. This sword is capable of cutting through all physical matter by ignoring durability to strike at the soul directly, inflicting wounds that cannot be healed by normal means.

title: Repair Powder
description: #Darksouls - An enchanted golden powder, when the entire bag is spread across a weapon its durability is restored and its damages repaired as long as the item is in one piece. The stronger or more magical an item is, the more powder is required. Restock Timer: 12 Hours

title: Threaded Cane
description: #Bloodborne - One of the weapons of the workshop hunters used to face off against the beasts. In its cane form, the threaded cane still has a sharp edge enough to hurt beasts, but when its trick form is revealed the cane splits into numerous blades arranged into a whip that can be used to rend and shred flesh from a distance.

title: Chikage
description: #Bloodborne - A blade wielded by the royal guards of Annalise, Queen of the Vilebloods. Chikage is an exceptional katana with incredible durability. But its power comes from the runes engraved onto it, allowing its user to sink the blade into their own flesh and imbue it with their vital essence to amplify its power. In addition, while wielding the Chikage all Necromancy and Blood-based abilities are amplified.

title: Holy Moonlight Sword
description: #Bloodborne - An ancient sword uncovered and wielded by Ludwig. By expending the user's energy the blade channels the endless abyssal cosmos and wreathes itself in moonlight to amplify its power. The user can expel the moonlight to amplify the power of the blade, release energy bursts or channel their own powers through the blade alongside the moonlight to boost the power.

title: Reiterpallasch
description: #Bloodborne - A refined weapon wielded by the knight of Cainhurst Castle. This weapon combines a rapier and a gun without compromising either. This weapon can be transformed into a bayonet to amplify the aspects of the gun part. You can let your own blood and turn it into quicksilver bullets to feed into the gun.

title: Saw Cleaver
description: #Bloodborne - Iconic weapons of the hunters. This saw can transform into a long cleaver or a serrated saw depending on your needs. In addition, this weapon is stronger the most beastlike your opponent is.

title: Bottle of infinite lotion
description: #A simple bottle of slimy lotion that contains an infinite amount of lotion inside. Lotion must be squeezed out manually and trying to tamper with the bottle will simply break it.

title: Power Pole
description: #Dragon Ball - An incredibly durable Bo Staff wielded by Son Goku(The Saiyan, not the god), that allows the user to freely extend its length by expending their energy.

title: Kubikiribochi
description: #Naruto - An oversized cleaver-shaped curved sword revered as one of the blades wielded by the seven swordsmen of the mist. This blade is incredibly durable and conducts energy well. In addition, no matter how damaged the blade is, it will repair itself as long as it absorbs blood.

title: Malorian Overture
description: #(Tech)Cyberpunk 2077 - A heavy-duty, powerful double-action revolver produced by Malorian Arms. This gun is incredibly powerful, even being able to punch a hole in half-borgs with each bullet. You also get 30 bullets every day for it.

title: Deed to Land
description: #A deed to a land, just rip this deed in half and you will have always owned land in a location that is favourable to you.

title: Deed to Mansion
description: #A deed to a mansion, just rip this deed in half and you will have always owned a lavish mansion manned by a Schrodinger crew that keeps it clean and maintained, they always do the work but can never be seen or interacted with.

title: Door to Jail
description: #Allows you to open a door to a jail block, this jail block is maintained by automatons, anyone inside of the cells is unable to use it unless allowed by you or who you appoint as warden. Anyone inside the cell is healed slowly and gets served 3 meals a day by the automatons.

title: Five Hundred Cigarettes
description: #500 non brand name generic ciggaretes. Useful for taking the edge off.

title: Rust Bucket
description: #(Tech)Ben 10 - A fairly large cozy RV owned by Maxwell Tennyson that has been upgraded numerous times with Plumber Technology. In addition to being an effective mobile home, it can fly and is equipped with numerous offence and defence systems.

title: Transformer Spark
description: #(Tech)Transformers - A spark is what makes up the being of a Transformer. When you imbue this spark into any sufficiently large piece of technology it will turn into a transformer and register itself as a familiar.

title: ColorS
description: #Fairy Tail - A small book-like magic item that allows the holder to change the color scheme of their clothing by sliding their finger over its surface.

title: Gale Force Reading Glasses
description: #Fairy Tail - A magical item in the form of a pair of spectacles. Wearing these glasses allows one to read books much faster. Allowing them to read any book they are holding 64x faster without sacrificing reading comprehension.

title: Music Player
description: #(Tech)Not just an ordinary music player, this player is indestructible and has excellent sound quality, with built-in speakers and headphones. It is capable of playing any song the holder has heard of before and records it inside its archive.

title: Archenemy
description: #Fairy Tail - A sealed sword imbued with extremely uncontrollable amounts of magical power. The moment the sword is unsheathed it will produce a slash that can cut through several city blocks like butter at minimum. It is advised to keep it inside the sheath.

title: Magic Ticket
description: #Fairy Tail - A magical ticket that when you rip allows you to choose a grimoire that contains a branch of magic from the world of Fairy Tale. Chosen magic cannot be a Lost Magic, Ancient Magic, Time Magic, Space Magic, Dragonslayer Magic or otherwise any magic above Elite tier. The Chosen Magic category is transformed into a Grimoire you can study to learn from.

title: Fev Vat
description: #(Tech)Fallout - An industrial vat filled with Forced Evolutionary Virus. Turning any human dropped inside into a Super Mutant. In addition, it can also affect animals dropped inside too, usually granting them increased abilities or killing them.

title: Null Void Projector
description: #(Tech)Ben 10 - A handheld projection gun that allows the user to open portals to the Null Void or send whatever they hit into the Null Void. It requires recharging between shots but hey, whatever you sent there is no longer your problem. Incapacitating someone with the Null Void does not grant a feat.

title: Tome of Destruction
description: #Skyrim - A tome that compiles the various destruction spells found in the kingdom of Skyrim and allows the user to train in and learn the spells inside. Spell List: https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Destruction_(Skyrim)

title: Tome of Restoration
description: #Skyrim - A tome that compiles the various restoration spells found in the kingdom of Skyrim and allows the user to train in and learn the spells inside. Spell List: https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Restoration_(Skyrim)

title: Tome of Conjuration
description: #Skyrim - A tome that compiles the various conjuration spells found in the kingdom of Skyrim and allows the user to train in and learn the spells inside. Spell List:

title: Tome of Alteration
description: #Skyrim - A tome that compiles the various alteration spells found in the kingdom of Skyrim and allows the user to train in and learn the spells inside. Spell List:

title: Tome of Illusion
description: #Skyrim - A tome that compiles the various illusions spells found in the kingdom of Skyrim and allows the user to train in and learn the spells inside. Spell List:

title: Potarra Earrings
description: #Dragon Ball - A pair of magical earrings that when worn one each by two different beings, permanently fuses them into one entity that possesses the sum of their powers and abilities.

title: Celestial Bronze
description: #Percy Jackson - A mythical metal native to Mount Olympus. Celestial Bronze possesses the property of being deadly to any magical or mythical being while being completely harmless to anything mundane, passing through them like it's not even there. You get 3 10kg bars. Restock Timer: 24 Hours

title: Stygian Iron
description: #Percy Jackson - Stygian Iron is a metal native to the River Styx of the underworld. This metal has the property of being able to destroy or absorb the essences of those it kills. Additionally, it is extremely durable and amplifies the power of darkness, necromancy, or infernal abilities. You get 3 10kg bars. Restock Timer: 24 Hours

title: Ebony Blade
description: #Skyrim - A Daedric Artifact owned by Mephala, Ebony is an indestructible and sharp katana that is capable of absorbing a portion of the vitality of those it has slain and imbue it into the wielder to heal them of their injuries. It is also capable of silencing those it strikes preventing them from casting magic. This blade is strengthened by slaying those who consider you as a friend with its blade.

title: Emperors Blade
description: #Samurai Jack - The ultimate divine blade against evil forged by Odin, Ra and Rama that represents all good in the world. It can only be used in the hands of the righteous and good. The blade is completely unbreakable and incredibly sharp, being reinforced by the user's spirit. Any creature of darkness or infernal will get parts of its body vaporized when damaged by the sword. Massively amplifies the power of holy and light abilities when used as a focus.

title: Stopwatch
description: #A stopwatch that allows the user to stop the time of the universe around them when used, often employed by Ugly Bastards or people whose hair obscures their eyes.

title: Ricks Portal Gun
description: #(Tech)Rick and Morty - A portal gun built by one of the smartest yet stupidest and drunkest inventors in the multiverse. This portal gun is capable of opening portals to any non-spatial blocked location including other universes as long as you know the location's co-ordinates or specifications. The portal fluid refills every 24 hours.

title: Ring of the Bull
description: #This golden ring ruby ring grants its wearer increased strength and endurance when worn. These increased stats are half a flat boost and half a percentage boost.

title: Riptide
description: #Percy Jackson - Riptide is the sword of the demigod son of Poseidon made of Celestial bronze. Making it exceptionally durable and sharp while being unable to hurt anything or anyone mundane. In addition it is able to switch between the form of a pen and a sword at will for you to decide which is stronger. Boosts the power of water affinity when used as a focus.

title: Helm of Darkness
description: #Percy Jackson - One of Hades' symbols of power, this ornate helmet allows whoever wears it to become completely invisible to all senses, pass through walls and melt into shadows. In addition, they are able to radiate an aura of primordial fear when using it. Using the helmet's abilities consumes the energy of the user.

title: Hyperbolic Time Chamber
description: #Dragon Ball - This Hyperbolic Time Chamber allows whoever enters to spend time training inside the gravity-enhanced dimension or just use the safe part as a hideout. The time dilation of the Time Chamber is 3 to 1 meaning three days inside equal to one day outside. You can access the Time Chamber From any door place your hands on.

title: Weapon Voucher
description: #A ticket for any one mundane cold weapon, just tear apart the ticket and think of the weapon you want and it will arrive in your hands.

title: Nail of Helena
description: #Hellsing - A true divine artefact used to nail the saint to the cross. When nailed to someone's heart it transforms them into a being known as a Monster of God(See trait: Monster of God).

title: Dragon Dictionary
description: #Skyrim - A dictionary on Thu'um written by Parthuunax, written to be able to teach anyone the Thu'um. Inside it is all of the Shouts from Tamriel that those who study the book can learn. Your ability to learn the shouts depends on your talent in magic and vocals. The more powerful and esoteric a shout the harder it is to learn it and its stages. Spell List: https://elderscrolls.fandom.com/wiki/Dragon_Shouts

title: Cupids Arrow
description: #An arrow that makes two people it pierces fall in love. Just stab each target once. The moment you stab the first, they will fall in love with the second person you pierce. To make it reciprocal just repeat the process by stabbing the other person first. Targets Legendary Rank or Stronger can resist the effects.

title: Hand of Midas
description: #The severed hand of King Midas that still retains his power to turn anything it touches into gold. Anything that you touch with the pointer finger that weighs less than 5 tons or is weaker than Epic rank will be turned into solid gold. But living beings can resist its effects depending on how strong they are.

title: FREAK Chip
description: #Hellsing - A high-tech complex chip developed and created by Incognito. When implanted into a person, the Freak Chip transforms their body into that of an artificial vampire(From Hellsing) along with all of their powers and weaknesses. The success of the transformation depends on the compatibility. But there is little chance of failure. Once implanted the chip fuses with the person. You would need Expert Biology and Master Mechanics to reverse engineer it.

title: Retroactive Builders Contract
description: #A folded-up contract that promises full satisfaction. Just put the specifications of what you want built and where inside of the contract and put in enough money that would normally be required to fund the construction including labor costs etc. The moment you sign the contract off it will burn to ashes whatever you asked for will have been retroactively expertly built an unspecified amount of time ago alongside the money being removed from your possession. Restock Timer: 720 hours.

title: Mansion of the Boundary
description: #A regular mansion to the user's tastes that sits in the middle of everything. Even the Outer Ones cannot breach its dimension, and as the mansion sits in the middle of everything in its own reality, you can enter the mansion through any door you touch and exit it at any door that exists in the confines of reality. Even other multiverses or gardens.

title: Plague Reaper Armor
description: #(Tech)Calamity Mod - A high-tech plague doctor armor fused with the Plague Nanovirus. Wearing this armour greatly amplifies your physical stats and includes a hud to help with your aiming. The armour makes you immune to all diseases and poison below Divine Level while amplifying the power of your own poison and bio abilities greatly. You can also temporarily release a little of the Plague Nanovirues to rot your enemies from the inside out before they dissolve naturally to avoid an apocalypse.

title: Wulfrum Armor
description: #(Tech)Calamity Mod - A simple high-tech armour made of wulfrum that provides reasonable defence and comfort. But when the switch is activated the armour turns into a power armour with its own powerful machinegun with energy already supplied. This mode has a 24-hour cooldown.

title: Photon Ripper
description: #(Tech)Calamity Mod - An incredibly high-technology chainsaw made by Dreadon out of Exo materials. This chainsaw projects dozens of hard light sharp that spin at insane speeds and can adjust its distance as needed, strong enough to shred basically anything in its path. Just a little bit of an overkill for chopping trees.

title: Master Ninjas Belt
description: #A black inconspicuous belt that once belonged to a master ninja. Wearing this belt grants you incredibly acrobatic abilities, allows you to stick to walls, ignore fall damage and muffle all sounds you make unintentionally(Does not work for anything above the volume of speaking).

title: Smoke Bomb
description: #"Smoke Bomb!" a simple-looking smoke bomb. You can throw one of these at your feet and if you successfully manage to obscure yourself from everyone you can teleport anywhere in a 25-meter range instantly that you would otherwise be able to get into. Restock Timer: 12 Hours

title: ASTER Augmentation Ticket
description: #(Tech)Halo - A ticket that when ripped, sends the user into a dimension with highly advanced robotic doctors and surgeons who will perform the ASTER procedure on you in order to turn you into a Spartan. This procedure is perfected and will not cause failure regardless of the target's age or condition. This procedure gives a more durable skeleton, enhanced musculature, visual acuity and reflexes with enhanced mental clarity.

title: MJOLNIR Powered Assult Armor IV
description: #Halo - An advanced Power Armor designed for Superhumans. This high-tech suit is incredibly flexible, not hindering the user's mobility while enhancing their physical capabilities, providing excellent protection against harm and terrain. It is also equipped with basic AI to manage the suits features as well as HUD.
